description.hltext_display: Medical Coding Companies in Tulsa, OK
description.content: If medical coding is not done properly, it will lead to errors like under coding and over coding, which in turn results in denial of claims and revenue loss. With efficient medical coding services, you can enjoy cleaner claims, fewer denials, enhanced revenue and freedom to focus on your core capabilities. This is the reason why most of the clinics, rehabilitation centers, multi-specialty hospitals, long-term care clinics, nursing homes, acute care hospitals, individual physicians and group practices choose medical coding companies in Tulsa, OK for handling their medical coding issues. By hiring the services of medical coding companies in Tulsa, you benefit from quality, accurate medical coding without major investment in staff and infrastructure. It not only helps you to increase profit and productivity but also to get the best out of your practice. Benefits of seeking the help of medical coding professionals in Tulsa, Oklahoma include • Streamlines your business operations efficiently • Allows you to focus on core business activities • Reduce your paper work and administrative responsibilities • Reduce the overhead cost of maintaining the business • Enhance the flexibility of your organization Medical coding companies in Tulsa, OK offer medical coding services such as hospital/inpatient coding, emergency room e-code evaluation, medical coding audits, payer specific coding requirements, DRG/ICD-9-CM coding validations and review, facility/non facility RVUs, ICD-9 coding based on AMA and CMS guidelines, CPT coding and more. In order to deliver superior quality medical coding solutions to the clients, medical coding companies are usually equipped with a pool of experienced and highly skilled workforce. They are well-versed in the latest coding rules and have proficiency in using advanced hardware and software to ensure accurate coding results. Before selecting a firm, make sure you are choosing the one that ideally matches your requirements. Find out details such as the reputation of the company, their years of experience, quality of services and more to ensure a good working relationship with your chosen firm.

description.hltext_display: 发改委称今年物价涨幅将控制在3.3%左右
description.content:
标签： 物价涨幅 发改委 控制 字体
摘要：这个数字也进一步印证了上个月发改委主任张平提出的今年我国物价涨幅将比3%稍微高一点的说法。
今年物价涨幅或略超3% 仍在调控范围内
孙书博
2010年全年物价涨幅将控制在3.3%左右。
据中央电视台报道，国家发改委副主任彭森昨天在全国价格认证工作会议上首次透露上述数据，这个数字也进一步印证了上个月发改委主任张平提出的今年我国物价涨幅将比3%稍微高一点的说法。
新华社昨天播发的一篇文章中也指出，专家预测，全年CPI涨幅可能会略高于3%。
但随着各项宏观调控措施的落实，今后一个时期物价总水平有望保持基本稳定。
多位接受《第一财经日报》记者采访的业内人士也认为，全年CPI控制在3.3%预示着今年12月份CPI涨幅较11月份将明显收窄，国家稳定物价的“组合拳”已经初显成效。
12月CPI有望回落
数据显示，1至11月份累计，全国CPI同比涨幅已经达到了3.2%，而年初确定的调控目标是3%左右。
“我们原来预定的宏观调控目标是3%左右，而且是一个预期性的、指导性的目标。3%稍稍过一点应该也还在这个调控目标的范围之内。”国家统计局新闻发言人盛来运近日说。
盛来运表示，12月份有很多稳定物价的有利条件。最有利的条件是国务院16条措施的效果会不断显现。另外，翘尾因素在12月份就没有了，这对拉低物价总水平也会产生积极的作用。
银河证券高级经济学家苑德军在接受本报记者采访时说，12月份CPI涨幅有望收窄。
CPI止涨回落，这是目前业内的普遍预期。
彭森介绍说，稳定消费价格总水平、保障群众基本生活工作已取得初步成效。从11月底开始，蔬菜价格出现明显下降，棉花、食糖和化肥价格高位回落。
国家统计局近日公布的全国200个主产县主要农产品价格变动则显示，12月1日到10日15种主要农产品当中，籼稻、活羊、苹果、柑橘等价格涨幅已明显下降，而籽棉价格则与11月下旬相比下跌7.84%。
11月29日~12月10日，根据《国务院关于稳定消费价格总水平保障群众基本生活的通知》文件要求，国务院办公厅、国家发改委、监察部、商务部共同组成国务院督查组，赴山西、天津、江苏就落实国务院文件情况进行督促检查。
督查发现，有关地区市场秩序总体良好，重要商品价格有所回落，低收入群众生活得到较好安置。
据新华社全国农副产品和农资价格行情系统监测，与前一日相比，12月21日，猪肉价格下降；成品粮价格稳中有涨；蔬菜、水果、水产品、禽蛋、牛羊肉、食用油价格微幅波动；奶类价格基本稳定。
监测的21种蔬菜中，7种价格下降，3种价格上涨，11种价格持平。
阶段性成果仍须巩固
彭森表示，以农产品为主的城乡居民生活必需品价格上涨，成为推升价格总水平的重要因素。
彭森认为，这次价格上涨是多种因素相互交织、相互叠加、综合作用的结果，成因较为复杂。既有成本逐步上升的内在原因，也有国际市场大宗商品涨价向国内传导的外部影响；既有自然灾害多发造成的临时冲击，也有投机炒作加剧带来的泡沫成分。
他强调，目前取得的成绩只是初步的、阶段性的，引发价格上涨的根本原因仍未消除。今后一段时间，中国价格运行的环境将更趋复杂，面临的挑战将更为严峻，稳定消费价格总水平、保障群众基本生活的任务十分艰巨。他要求各级价格主管部门，增强做好稳定价格工作的紧迫感和责任感。
交通银行金融研究中心近日发布的研究报告在预测全年CPI涨幅可能达到3.2%左右的同时也指出，由于通货膨胀预期形成之后，物价会有一定的上涨惯性；同时2011年1~2月将是我国传统的春节期间，节日需求会带动部分产品的价格上涨；加上进入冬季以来，低温雪灾等灾害性天气出现的可能性增加，将给蔬菜瓜果等农产品的生产和运输带来困难，2011年一季度物价上涨的压力仍然较大，但在物价持续上涨已引起政府高度关注的情况下，预计物价上涨的势头会在2011年二季度后得到有效控制，预计2011年物价上涨将呈现前高后低的走势。

description.hltext_display: BPO Services
description.content:
Outsourcing is generally classified as an organization entering into a contract with another organization to manage and operate one or more of its business processes. Business process outsourcing is often classified as a back office outsourcing that involves business transactions like financing and accounting, human resources and also front office outsourcing such as customer related services like contact center services.
Technology nowadays are very innovative and so much advanced, yet most companies, businesses or even enterprises choose to outsource their business functions, partially or entirely to an external service provider. Business sectors usually outsourced include real estate, accounting processes, human resources and information technology. However, most companies prevalently outsource customer support and call center functionalities such as customer service, telemarketing, web designing, web development, CAD services, virtual assistance, marketing research and many others.
BPO services are equipped with highly efficient and abreast facilities that can satisfy client's needs and expectations. New facilities are more likely to have developed and emerged in services of a BPO provider like IVR, ACD, voice logging, predictive dialer software, fax on demand and soft phone. BPO services mostly consist of three category, these categories are inbound services, outbound services and back office services. Any BPO services are supported and enforced by proficient and well-trained agents that assist, manage and provide help with the whole business transactions through abundant outbound and inbound call services. Call center agents are intellectually groomed by prolific and intelligible superiors, informing them all about phone etiquettes or in proper handling of clients over the phone and in assisting calls regarding to surveys, lead generation, lead verifications, sales and collections.
Outbound Customer Services offers appointment settings, telemarketing, voice broadcasting, product or service advancement and promotion, lead generation, cross selling, up-selling and market research & survey. Inbound Services provides assistance such as inquiry handling, interactive voice response, customer service, answering service, direct mail response, chat and email support, help desk solutions, and sales lead qualification.
While on the other hand, Back office services is servicing billing and product information, web marketing services and opportunities, transcription services and order taking services.

description.hltext_display: ديون أوروبا تقود أسعار الذهب للارتفاع
description.content:
آخر تحديث: الاربعاء 22 ديسمبر 2010 10:58 ص بتوقيت القاهرة
تعليقات: 0 شارك بتعليقك
-
ارتفع سعر الذهب، اليوم الأربعاء، مع استمرار الدعم لمعنويات السوق بتأثير المخاوف من مزيد من خفض التصنيفات الائتمانية للدول الأوروبية المثقلة بالدَّين.
وكان حجم التعاملات ضعيفًا قبل عطلة نهاية العام، ويتوخى بعض المستثمرين الحذر بشأن تعزيز المراكز أكثر من اللازم، قبل أحدث تقدير للناتج المحلي الإجمالي في الولايات المتحدة للربع الثالث.
وارتفع السعر الفوري للذهب 3.69 دولار للأوقية (الأونصة)، مسجلاً 1388.99 دولار للأوقية، وما زال الذهب أقل بكثير من المستوى التاريخي المرتفع عند حوالي 1430 دولارًا، الذي سجله في وقت سابق هذا الشهر، ولكن يلقى دعما من المخاوف بشأن أزمة الدين التي اجتاحت اليونان وأيرلندا، والتي يمكن أن تعرض البرتغال وأسبانيا لضغوط أكبر.

description.hltext_display: W powiecie poznańskim stawiają na drogi
description.content:
Powiat poznański okazał się szybszy od stolicy Wielkopolski oraz sejmiku wojewódzkiego i mimo wyborów samorządowych zdążył przyjąć budżet przed świętami Bożego Narodzenia. Wczoraj rada powiatu przyjęła dokument tylko przy jednym głosie wstrzymującym się. Nawet opozycja z PiS głosowała "za" i - wbrew tradycji - nie zgłaszała na sesji żadnych poprawek.
W powiecie od 2002 r. rządzi PO i bez problemu może forsować swoje projekty.
Jakie są najważniejsze zadania dla powiatu w 2011 roku? To między innymi remont ulicy Wrzesińskiej w Swarzędzu i drogi powiatowej z Biedruska do Bolechowa. W 2010 r. wyremontowano most na Warcie w ciągu tej drogi, teraz modernizowane będą pozostałe fragmenty.
Planowane są także inwestycje w ośrodku dla dzieci niewidomych w Owińskach (m.in. rozbudowa parku) i kolejne etapy modernizacji szpitala w Puszczykowie.
Docelowo placówkę czeka całościowa termomodernizacja. Władze powiatu chcą także inwestować w nowy blok operacyjny w Puszczykowie.
Jakie inwestycje muszą poczekać? M.in. rozbudowa szkoły w Murowanej Goślinie. Na szczęście ta gmina wzbogaci się w przyszłym roku o inną ważną inwestycję - obwodnicę miasta, która zostanie otwarta jesienią 2011 r. Obwodnica jest jednak budowana za pieniądze unijne oraz fundusze Wielkopolskiego Zarządu Dróg Wojewódzkich.

description.hltext_display: China replaces top Foreign Ministry official
description.content:
China has replaced a top diplomat amid a trend toward greater assertiveness in handling territorial disputes and participating in global organizations.
Vice Foreign Minister Zhang Zhijun took over recently as the ministry's Communist Party secretary, state media reports said Wednesday, likely putting him in line to eventually take over from Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi. Yang was accused of being caught off guard when U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton announced at a security conference in Vietnam this year that Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
Zhang, 57, had served almost his entire career in the party's International Liaison Department, a type of shadow Foreign Ministry focusing on contacts with foreign political parties, until he became deputy to Yang last year.
That party background may mean he has more of a say in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world. The country's rising economic clout amid the global economic downturn that has battered traditional powers such as the United States has emboldened Chinese leaders to demand a bigger say in global affairs such as climate change and at international organizations, including the United Nations.
China's aggressive assertion of its territorial claims in the South China and East China seas have, meanwhile, sparked a backlash from other countries in the region, drawing them closer to Washington.
The powerful People's Liberation Army is believed to be leading the calls for a tougher line in such disputes, while other Cabinet officials have emphasized quietly advancing China's interests in economic, media and cultural spheres.
China's most senior diplomat, State Counselor Dai Bingguo, is seen as balancing the different arguments, although the country's opaque political system ensures that such debates almost never make it into the public arena.
Little is known about Zhang's personal style, although his party background and relative lack of experience working abroad suggest he will closely reflect the tone set by the party leadership.
Zhang's appointment was announced on official websites, including that of the party's People's Daily newspaper, but no exact date was given.
He takes over from Wang Guangya, a courtly career diplomat who was ambassador to the U.N. from 2003-2008, during which China took advantage of the U.S. preoccupation with Iraq to quietly expand its diplomatic space.

event_or_fact.property: Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world

description.hltext_display: Çinlilerin taklit edemediği tek ürün
description.content:
Lletaşı ve Diğer Değerli Taşlar İşletme Kooperatifi Başkanı Muharrem Yılmaz, ihracat hacmi 5 milyon dolardan 500 bin dolara dşen lletaşını yeraltından ıkarılmasını sağlamak ve markalaştırma alışmalarını yapmak zere kooperatif atısı altında birleştiklerini syledi. Lletaşı ve Diğer Değerli Taşlar İşletme Kooperatifi Başkanı Muharrem Yılmaz, AA muhabirine yaptığı aıklamada, sadece Eskişehir'de ıkarılan lletaşının toprağın 380 metre altında bulunan değerli bir maden olduğunu belirtti. ''Beyaz altın'' diye tabir edilen lletaşının değerinin bilinmediğini ifade eden Yılmaz, şunları syledi: ''Altın bile dnyanın heryerinde varken lletaşı bir tek Eskişehir'de bulunuyor. Ancak bu değerli madeni ıkaracak madenci bulamıyoruz. İlkel şartlarda kuyulara iniliyor, o nedenle bu işi herkes yapmıyor. Bu işi yapanlar ya yaşlandılar ya da kyden kente g edince bu işi bıraktılar. Eskiden hammade ıkaran bini aşkın madenci vardı, bu sayı azaldı.'' -''İN'İN TAKLİT EDEMEDİĞİ TEK RN''- Lletaşının yurtdışından ok rağbet grdğn zellikle pipo yapımı konusunda tercih edilen bir hammadde olduğunu kaydeden Yılmaz, ''Yurtdışından ok isteyen var. ABD, Avrupa lkeleri hatta in'e bile tanıtım amalı gidiyoruz. inliler hammadde olmadığı iin bir tek buna el atamadılar. in'in taklit edemediği tek rn bu. Maden olsa taklit edecekler ama ellerinde hammadde yok'' diye konuştu. Lletaşının hammadde olarak yurtdışına ıkarılmasının yasak olduğunu belirten Yılmaz, şunları kaydetti:
''Bu, madenin değerini daha da artırıyor. Biz sadece işlediğimiz rnleri ihra edebiliyoruz. Ancak, lletaşının yeraltından ıkarılmasına ilişkin yaşanan sıkıntı nedeniyle son dnemde ihracatta da sıkıntı yaşıyoruz. 10 yıl nce 5 milyon dolar olan ihracat hacmi, 500 bin dolara dşt.'' Hammaddenin yeraltından ıkarılışı azalınca, işlenen taş miktarının da azaldığına dikkati eken Yılmaz, şu bilgileri verdi: ''8 ay nce kooperatif kurduk. reticileri bir araya toplayıp madeni ıkarıp, işleyip yurtdışına pazarlayacağız. Kooperatif olarak lletaşını markalaştırıp, altının zerindeki gibi damga vurup retimi oğaltmak istiyoruz. Hamdaddenin ıkarılmasını sağlayacağız. Lletaşının byk bir pazarı var.'' -HAVAYI TEMİZLİYOR- Lletaşının ss eşyasının yanı sıra pipo yapımında da kullanıldığını belirten Muharrem Yılmaz, ''Pipo yapılmasının amacı nikotin emme zelliğinden kaynaklı. Ttn imek iin en iyi materyal lletaşıdır'' dedi. Dokusu sngerimsi olan lletaşının, filtre gibi bulunduğu ortamı temizleme zelliği bulunduğunu syleyen Muharrem Yılmaz, ''Bu yzden de astıma iyi geliyor. Havayı temizliyor, ocukların alışma odası, salon, sigara iilen ortamlara lletaşı konulduğu zaman havanın temizlenmesini sağlıyor. Sigara ağızlının bile 2 sene nikotini temizleme zelliği var'' diye konuştu.
AA

description.hltext_display: Increased social security vital
description.content:
THERE is need for social security institutions to diversify investment as a way of creating adequate finances for the institutions and beneficiaries.
This could lead to increased investment portfolio and ultimately ease the delays that have charaterised process of accessing retirement package in the past.
The social security institutions could shore up finances in different forms of investment which in the long run could be profitable and benefit its members.
Diversifying has proven workable as could be observed from Public Service Pensions Fund (PSPF) following its recapitalisation of Bisonite Zambia Limited in Ndola.
Bisonite Zambia was facing liquidity problems for more than two years which led PSPF to recapitalise the entity by pumping in US$3,872 million.
With this investment, the Ndola-based company was given a new lease of life which has contributed to effective and efficient utilisation of raw materials that have led to improved product quality, reduced production costs, increased production and reduction on energy costs.
Bisonite is a timber processing plant and manufactures a variety of items for the local and international market.
During the commissioning of the new plant at the company recently, PSPF board chairperson Moses Banda said that prior to recapitalisation, Bisonite was beset with a myriad of challenges ranging from low production capacity to liquidity problems which made it difficult for the company to operate smoothly.
Dr Banda was optimistic that the company was going to be profitable and make a good return on the investment.
PSPF investment in Bisonite Zambia currently stands at $10.8 million in both equity and debt.
The recapitalisation programme of Bisonite started in November 2007 when Bisonite Zambia PLC offered rights of 9786,412 ordinary shares to existing shareholders at a price of $0.46 per share in the ratio of two to one.
This was done so by the company to raise funds to recapitalise the business.
PSPF was offered 8,421,846 additional shares valued at $3.874 million to the company given the number of shares held.
The funds which had been invested to recapitalise belong to the members of the PSPF.
“An investment of this nature is one of the avenues the fund is utilising to raise revenue for purposes of meeting some of the pension’s benefits,” Dr Banda said.
With the completion of the recapitalisation, it was expected that the performance of the company would improve given the modernisation of the plant and equipment in the course of 2011.
He said the potential for the company’s growth was high following the installation of the new plant and machinery.
“We anticipate significant improvements in the efficiencies and production capacities. It is in light of this that an equity partner be sought to help sustain the anticipated improvement in the performance,” he said.
Despite having the 94 per cent shareholding in the company under the PSPF investment guidelines needs to reduce share holding to about 30 per cent.
Dr Banda said for PSPF to reduce the shareholding in the company it needs to under take a private placement where selected investors would be invited to invest in the company through the sale of part of the PSPF shares held.
This would be conducted in 2012 on condition that Bisonite would be up to date with audited financial statements and conducts a fresh valuation of the company.
He was hopeful that the plant would contribute to employment opportunities on the Copperbelt.
“This also demonstrated the useful role that a pension scheme like PSPF plays in the economy of the country,” he said.
Bisonite Zambia board chairperson Charles Mubita commended PSPF and Bisonite staff for the efficient execution of the recapitalisation programme.
Mr Mubita said the money invested by PSPF was used to liquidate the debt which was about $1.91 million and the purchase of the machinery while the other money was the working capital for the company.
Bisonite Zambia managing director Pindani Nyirenda tabulated some of the machinery purchased from the PSPF funding.
The machinery include flaker for the particle board operation, a complete integrated and sawmill and re-saw, a front-end-loader for the yard operations, a moulding machine for the solid mill operations, 2x bell loggers for plant forestry operations, a folk lift for the operations particle board lifting, a compressor for the particle chiller.
The rest of the machine include a tractor for the yard operations, a logging trailer for the forestry operations, 3x utility vehicles for back-up operations and an additional winch for the kilns.
The PSPF funds were also used to recondition some of the machinery at the plant. These were the engines of two mechanical horses used in forestry operations, buying of spares for particle board operations and modification to the kiln section and a second door opening device was fabricated and installed.
Extensive refurbishment works to the existing bison dryer furnace steel works and factory inner housing of the same dryer and refurbishment works of the existing kiln hot water kettle.
The disbursement of the fund was closely monitored by both the PSPF management and Bisonite Zambia board.
Mr Nyirenda said with the machinery and equipment purchased and installed under this programme, a quality product in the particle board operations was expected resulting from the installation of the new flaker.
“With the installation of the new saw mill, sawn timber is now readily available and operational efficiencies have improved where plants are one running with greater consistency thereby reducing the cost of production,” Mr Nyirenda said.
He said with the increased volume of products management has repositioned the business in both local and export market.
Mr Nyirenda paid tribute to PSPF and said the planning and execution of the recapitalisation programme had reached its successful conclusion.
He pledged his company’s commitment to continue strengthening itself as it strives to implement the vision of the Bisonite Zambia limited and achieving its objectives.
“I would like to express our profound gratitude to the PSPF and its management for the relentless effort which culminated into what we are witnessing,”Mr Nyirenda said.
Board member Oliver Saasa said the company was also experiencing the spillover effects from the country’s economy and it was looking at the local market and regional market for product exportation.
Some of its markets in the region are South Africa, Botswana and Namibia.
With various forms of investment, social security institutions are assured of adequate finances.

description.hltext_display: South Korea drill likely to infuriate North
Sivasspor'un hırçın çocuğu Sedat
description.content:
Sezonun ilk yarısını 15 puanla 15'inci sırada tamamlayan Sivasspor'da, Futbol Federasyonu'nun sitesindeki verilere gre, kırmızı-beyazlı ekibin futbolcuları ilk yarıdaki 17 mata 2 kırmızı kart, 44 sarı kartla cezalandırıldı.
Forma şansı bulan 25 oyuncudan 18'i kartla cezalandırılırken, grev alan 7 oyuncu (Kaleci Alişan Şeker, Erman Kılı, Hayrettin Yerlikaya, İbrahim Şahin, Uğur Kavuk, Yannick Kamanan ve Alioum Saidou) maları kart grmeden tamamladı. 2 kez kırmızı kartla, 4 defa sarı kartla cezalandırılan savunma oyuncusu Sedat Bayrak, kırmızı-beyazlı ekibin en hırın ismi olarak dikkati ekti. Sivasspor'da Mehmet Nas 6, Ceyhun Eriş 5, Mehmet Yıldız 4 defa sarı kartla cezalandırıldı. Kırmızı-beyazlı ekipte ayrıca Deniss İvanovs ve Ziya Erdal'ın 3'er, Abdurrahman Dereli, Bruno Zita, Cihan Yılmaz, Kadir Bekmezci, Mamadou Diallo, Sedat Yeşilkaya ve kaleci Sead Ramovi'in 2'şer, Ferhat Bıkmaz, Murat Szgelmez, Ricardo Pedriel Suarez, Souleymane Keita ve kaleci Akın Vardar'ın 1'er sarı kartı bulunuyor.
-SEDAT, KART CEZALARI NEDENİYLE TAKIMINI YALNIZ BIRAKTI- Trabzonspor maında direkt kırmızı kart gren ve bu mata hakeme ynelik sportmenliğe aykırı hareketi dolayısıyla 4 msabakadan men cezası alan Sedat Bayrak, Konyaspor maında da ikinci sarı karttan grdğ kırmızı kartla takımını 10 kişi bıraktı. Konyaspor maında grdğ kırmızı kart nedeniyle de 17. haftada Fenerbahe karşısında takımdaki yerini alamayan Sedat Bayrak, Medical Park Antalyaspor, Bursaspor, Beşiktaş, Genlerbirliği malarında 1'er kez sarı kartla cezalandırıldı. Sarı kart cezası nedeniyle de Ankaragc maında takımını Başkent deplasmanında yalnız bırakan tecrbeli oyuncu Sedat Bayrak, sezonun ilk yarısındaki 17 maın 11'inde forma giydi. Sedat, bu 11 maın 2'sinde de kırmızı kart grerek oyun dışı kaldı.
Sivasspor'da en fazla kart gren oyuncular arasında yer alan Mehmet Nas, İstanbul Bykşehir Belediyespor maında, Ceyhun Eriş Kasımpaşa karşılaşmasında, Mehmet Yıldız ise Fenerbahe msabakasında sarı kart cezaları nedeniyle forma giyemedi.
AA

description.hltext_display: 10 Day Free Trial Credit Report: Available and Useful
description.content: Credit report of the borrowers is created by the financial bureaus, Equifax, Trans Union and Experian by name. The borrowers can also find their credit report in the websites of some other financial agencies. The financial bureaus build up the credit report of the borrowers with the data containing financial transactions of the borrowers which they collect from different financial institutions and agencies working in the financial market. They collect data like accounts of loan payment, amount of loan secured by the borrower, his accounts of repayment, details about less payment, late payment, fines, penalties, defaults, arrears, CCJs, IVAs, bankruptcies etc. The financial bureaus design a scale with marks from 330 to 850 as reading for credit score. This states the credit status of the borrowers. The lender refuses the borrower whose credit score is poor. 10 day free trial credit report has great importance. The borrowers have the right to find their individual credit report. It is important for them to know their credit report. Sometimes, the credit report of a borrower can show that he has weak credit score. This may occur because of mistakes in the credit report. The borrower can get the mistakes corrected and qualify for securing finance. He can also get a chance to improve his credit status before applying for fresh finance. The financial agencies and financial bureaus in particular have provisions for the borrower to find 10 day free trial credit report. The credit card reporting agencies allows him if he provides evidence of personal identity. The financial bureaus want that he must mention his credit card account. This is to mean that the financial bureau would charge fees from his credit card if he does not cancel his membership within 10 days. The borrower should take advantage of the 10 day free trial credit report. He will find there his 3-bureau credit report, his credit score and several data which have been used to prepare his credit score. The borrower can see 3-in-1 monitoring and credit scores added with automatic alarm of important changes in his credit report. Credit card frauds are not rare. The borrower while going through the 10 day free trial credit report can notice signs of credit card frauds. He may find how signs of identity have been thieved. His task is then to bring this to the notice of the financial bureaus staff so that they can take necessary steps.

description.hltext_display: 12名原省部级高官获刑 贪腐向执法领域渗透
description.content:
标签： 高官获刑 执法 无期徒刑 字体
摘要：2010年中国的反腐风暴依然在继续，伴随部分省部级官员相继落马的同时，也有12名省部级贪官相继领取一审有罪判决。
2010年高官贪腐警示录
田享华
[ 除了负责党纪的干部自身贪腐外，今年涉高官的判决还有一个特点，即涉及多名政法或者执法领域的高级官员
这些人在我们整个干部队伍中虽然只是极少数，但其危害绝不可低估。领导干部利用职权贪污受贿是当前腐败现象中最严重、最恶劣的表现]
2010年中国的反腐风暴依然在继续，伴随部分省部级官员相继落马的同时，也有12名省部级贪官相继领取一审有罪判决。
根据公开资料，在这12人当中，既有央企高管，也有地方党政领导；既有政法系统高官，还不乏人大、政协要员。
在各自的判决中，12名获刑的高官均犯有“受贿”罪；9人被判处“死缓”，3人被判处“无期徒刑”。从落马高官的学历来看，他们多数为本科以上学历，其中，半数都是研究生学历。有专家接受媒体采访时认为，大批高官落马，这足以见证国家近几年一直在加大查处腐败的力度。
反贪压力依然大
十余年致力于研究官员和官员犯罪的知名律师王荣利告诉《第一财经日报》，他今年收集公开报道的官员腐败典型案件已有数百起，其中省部级官员落马有数起，其中定罪则有12起，但他们有些并非今年才落马的。
“现在涉及高级官员的案件从案发到判决都拖长了时间。”王荣利说，有些案件2007、2008年开始调查，但是2010年才判，甚至都还没有判，或者一审上诉后二审再没消息的。
针对上述高官的获刑，王荣利也认为目前官员经济犯罪判决似乎有少用死刑(立即执行)的趋势，多数被判决死缓，甚至无期徒刑。
而此前全国人大常委会酝酿修改刑法以减少死刑罪名就曾引起公众的担心：是否会减少职务犯罪的死刑。虽然后来全国人大的官员也曾公开表示，修刑时未曾考虑过取消贪污贿赂犯罪的死刑。但是也有法律界人士表示：“即便贪污贿赂罪法条上的死刑没有减少，也不能防止在司法层面上的死刑有所减少。”
从近年查处的案例来看，本世纪近期查处的案件大多发生在本世纪初期几年，甚至就发生在近几年。王荣利认为这一事实说明另外一个结论：大规模、大声势地查处腐败犯罪，并没有对腐败犯罪现象形成有效的震慑并阻止腐败犯罪的蔓延和发展，新的腐败犯罪仍在不断大量发生，甚至一些领导干部“边反腐边腐败”或者“边腐败边反腐”。
“10年前，中央就强调加大从源头上预防和治理腐败现象的力度，但是现在看来，这方面的工夫下得远远不够。”王荣利多年连续发布官员和企业家犯罪年度报告，在他看来反腐败的压力还是相当之大。
贪腐向执法领域渗透
而记者从最高法院原院长肖扬去年出版的《反贪报告》中也了解到如下数据：1990年~1996年判处8名省部级和军队军职以上干部受贿、贪污罪犯，最高刑期是有期徒刑20年。这是自1952年判处刘青山、张子善高职位官员后近60年对高官贪腐分子的又一次严厉打击。
而在1998年至2002年5年间人民法院共判处省部级以上领导干部犯罪案件19件19人，2003年至2007年，这个数字上升到了30件30人，比前五年上升57.9%。
以1990年~2008年为例，全国法院所判处的原省部级干部罪犯中，受贿、贪污罪犯占90.5%，另有9.5%犯故意杀人、滥用职权、重婚、间谍罪。受贿、贪污罪犯中，有15名省部级以上干部被判处死刑立即执行或死刑缓期执行。肖扬就引用上述数字分析称：“虽然所涉及人员的绝对数量很小，但由于卷入者位高权重，所造成的破坏性很大。”
而2010年全国“两会”上，最高检察院检察长曹建明就透露，2009年查办厅局级官员204人，省部级8人。当然，这8人并不意味着当年就一审宣判，不过，相比2010年宣判的12名省部级高官，这样的增速还是让人吃惊。除了数量上的变化外，还有一些在外界看来相当清廉，甚至寄予厚望的领域也出现了高官腐败案，比如省级纪委、最高法院、公安部等。
比如，建国以来首名落马的省级纪委书记王华元，他因为在企业经营、职务升迁、案件处理、逃避抓捕等事项上为他人谋取利益，收受他人款物折合人民币共计771万余元，最后被判处死缓。对于这样负责党纪的干部也被腐败所击倒，一度让外界叹息。
除了负责党纪的干部自身贪腐外，今年涉高官的判决还有一个特点，即涉及多名政法或者执法领域的高级官员，包括最高法院原副院长黄松有被判无期徒刑，他也是至今因为贪腐而落马的级别最高的司法官员。此外，负责侦办经济案件的公安部原部长助理郑少东，还有享有“南粤政法王”之誉的广东省政协原主席陈绍基也在历经一年多调查审理后，于今年先后宣判，都获刑死缓。
这类负责政法或者纪律领域的干部违法违纪，曾被外界称为“人格分裂”的现象。不过，复旦大学国务学院政党制度学者郑长忠博士就告诉记者，不能将批评仅停留在对个人德行和职业责任的冲突上，尽管在传统上，官员的私德与职业操守是混合的。“将一个国家的反腐败事业寄托于某一部门或者某一类人的清廉上，本身就有问题。”不过，这里的问题还是相当具有启发性。
制度建设当加快
最高人民检察院原检察长、全国政协原副主席张思卿在去年给肖扬新书《反贪报告》所作的序言里就阐述过类似的忧虑：“特别引人注意的是，贪污贿赂等经济犯罪由生产、流通等经济部门的工作人员，蔓延到少数党政机关的干部和少数司法机关、行政执法机关的工作人员中，他们把权力商品化，把市场经济奉行的交换原则引入到党的生活和国家机关政务活动中，搞权钱交易、以权谋私、敲诈勒索、索贿受贿。”
另外，任内在检察机关中建立反贪污贿赂专门机构的最高人民检察院原检察长刘复之也在《反贪报告》的序言中提到，“共产党员、国家干部，特别是高级干部的绝大多数是好的，贪污受贿分子只是极少数。同时，从检察工作这个侧面也应该看到，贪污贿赂问题的确又是严重的，而且发生在党政机关的极少数贪污、受贿分子所造成的影响极坏。”
所以，张思卿也说：“这些人在我们整个干部队伍中虽然只是极少数，但其危害绝不可低估。领导干部利用职权贪污受贿是当前腐败现象中最严重、最恶劣的表现。一个地区、一个部门的主要领导干部贪污受贿、腐化堕落，往往导致这个地区、部门的腐败现象蔓延，贪污贿赂犯罪日益严重。”
而治理腐败，肖扬认为反贪污无穷期，不可能一劳永逸地解决。他强调走法治反贪之路，为此他提出了几大建议。首先，肖扬认为制定一部融组织法、刑事实体法、刑事程序法、行政法等于一体的统一的、专门的反腐败法。其次是完善相关配套法律，如加快制定《公职人员财产申报法》、《土地出让法》、《产权交易法》等专门法律，保证公共权力的赋予行使受到监督制约，依法揭露和惩处贪腐行为。
上海市律协刑事委员会副主任张培鸿律师也告诉记者，他在代理众多腐败案件中也发现，高级官员以及专家型人才如真要犯罪，也少有是因为不懂法才到此地步。要彻底打击腐败，他认为关键还是在于对掌握公权力的部门和官员进行监督，尤其是需要加大公众参与的力度，将权力行使的过程展现在阳光之下。
复旦大学国际关系与公共事务学院浦兴祖教授也对记者说，重点还是在于民主制度建设，因为没有监督的权力就很容易走向腐败，这就是人性问题。除非掌权者超越本能，站在国家的、人民的、民主的角度看问题，民主毕竟还是人类目前所找到的最好模式。
附表 12名原省部级干部公开审判信息
陈少勇 福建省委原常委、原秘书长 犯受贿罪，一审被判处无期徒刑
黄松有 最高人民法院原副院长 贪污、受贿案终审维持原判，被判无期徒刑
孙善武 河南省政协原副主席 犯受贿罪，二审核准死缓判决
王益 国家开发银行原副行长 犯受贿罪，一审被判处死缓
朱志刚 全国人大常委会预算工作委员会原主任 犯受贿罪，一审被判处无期徒刑
米凤君 吉林省人大常委会原副主任 犯受贿罪，一审被判处死缓
陈绍基 广东省政协原主席 犯受贿罪，一审被判处死缓
皮黔生 天津市委原常委、天津滨海新区管理委员会原主任 受贿、滥用职权一案二审维持死缓判决
郑少东 公安部原部长助理、经济犯罪侦查局原局长 犯受贿罪，一审被判处死缓
王华元 浙江省委原常委、省纪委原书记 受贿、巨额财产来源不明一案一审作出死缓判决

description.hltext_display: Mayor steamed over Queen City vote
description.content:
Pawlowski says authority's decision to accept grant for airport is 'ludicrous.'
X
Text Size
mc-allentown-airport-queen-city-20101221
In the scope of the millions of dollars in grants Lehigh Valley International Airport gets each year, the $56,250 state grant the airport authority accepted Tuesday might seem small.
But it ignited a big debate over whether Lehigh-Northampton Airport Authority should continue to spend money at Queen City Airport in south Allentown even as consultants study whether it should be sold to help pay LVIA's debt.
The authority's 7-4 vote to accept the state Department of Transportation grant to study replacing a 12,000-gallon fuel tank at Queen City angered Allentown Mayor Ed Pawlowski, who sits on the authority board. He believes the 210-acre airport, home to 105 privately owned planes, should be sold for development.
By accepting the money, the authority agrees to maintain Queen City for 10 years or face paying the money back if it sells the land. The authority is already obligated for $2.6 million in grants for work at Queen City if it sells the airport before 2029.
"This is ludicrous," Pawlowski said. "Obligating ourselves to the state for the next 10 years is extraordinarily short-sighted."
Board members who supported taking the grant argued that airport maintenance should not be put off, and delaying the work could cause the airport to lose the grant.
"Let's look at the big picture here. We're already obligated for 20 years on other grants," board Chairman David Haines said. "We're talking about $50,000."
"Yes, let's look at the big picture," Pawlowski shot back. "Should we be spending more grant money, when we're studying whether we should sell the land?"
Voting to take the grant were Haines, Anthony Boyle, Tony Iannelli, Larry Sheridan, Randy Uhler and airplane owners Frank Kovacs and Cindy Feinberg.
Voting against accepting the grant were Pawlowski, Robert Buesing, Michael Dowd and John Conklin.
The authority next month is scheduled to hire a consultant to evaluate the airport's assets — including Queen City and the 73-acre Braden Airpark in Forks Township — to determine what can be sold to help pay off a $26 million court judgment. The 14-year-old court case over development land the airport took in the early 1990s is winding down, and the authority will soon have to start paying the judgment.
Pawlowski has long lobbied that Queen City's location off Interstate 78 makes it prime development property that could bring jobs and investment to his struggling city. He argues the airport could be sold for $20 million to $40 million, raising enough to pay debts and repay the grants.
Other board members argue that Queen City is a key airport asset that helps alleviate small plane traffic at the main airport.
But none of that was at the heart of the argument by Jay Goldstein, a former lobbyist who says Queen City has become a country club for local airplane owners.
Goldstein told authority members that private pilots who use Queen City get a sweetheart deal on fuel and hangar fees, and have kept airport administrators from focusing their attention on increasing commercial traffic at the main airport in Hanover Township, Lehigh County.
Goldstein argued that new spending on Queen City is a ploy by supporters to make it more difficult to sell.
"They're charging private pilots $1 less per gallon than they're charging in Philadelphia, and the hangar fees amount to $9 per day to store a plane," Goldstein said. "I find that interesting, when you consider the public pays $14 a day to park their car at the airport."
Clarissa MacIntosh, president of the Queen City Airport Pilot's Organization, disagreed that Queen City is nothing more than a pilot's playground.
"We have a huge number of planes that land here instead of the main airport, relieving traffic there," MacIntosh said. "This is not a private airport. It is very much a public asset."
For now, it's a public asset that Pawlowski wants sold.
"I'll keep plugging away. I'm not giving up," Pawlowski said. "This is not over."

description.hltext_display: Blackberry helps RIM sales
description.content:
Canada-based Research-in-Motion (RIM) shipped approximately 14.2 million devices during fiscal 3Q/2010.
OEMRevenue for the third quarter of fiscal 2011 was USD 5.49 billion, up 19% from USD 4.62 billion in the previous quarter and up 40% from USD 3.92 billion in the same quarter of last year. The revenue breakdown for the quarter was approximately 82% for devices, 15% for service, and 3% for software and other revenue.
"We are pleased to report another record quarter with strong growth in shipments of BlackBerry smartphones leading to record revenue, subscriber additions and earnings. RIM’s business continues to grow and diversify as BlackBerry adoption accelerates in markets around the world," said Jim Balsillie, Co-CEO at Research In Motion.
The Company’s net income for the quarter was USD 911.1 million, compared with net income of USD 796.7 million in the prior quarter and net income of USD 628.4 million, in the same quarter last year.
Q4 Outlook
Revenue for the fourth quarter of fiscal 2011 ending February 26, 2011 is expected to be in the range of USD 5.5 - 5.7 billion. Gross margin percentage for the fourth quarter is expected to be similar to third quarter levels.

description.hltext_display: Back on track: Red Devils snap 3-game skid with 66-44 win over Westminster
description.content:
PORT BARRE — Port Barre boys' basketball head coach Andy Aymond had described his team as struggling going into Monday night's date with the Westminster Crusaders.
Perhaps they were, but showed no signs of those struggles Monday night.
The Red Devils snapped a three-game losing streak in impressive fashion at home, defeating Westminster 66-44 in a game that was largely won in transition for Aymond's group.
Offensively, the Devils looked more in-synch than in previous games, using crisp passing to set up a balanced scoring attack where no player had more than 12 points.
"I thought we played together as a team," Aymond said. "We've been having problems with not running our offense and not playing as a team. Today I thought we did a good job of making the extra pass and getting people involved. It really was a team effort tonight."
Port Barre had success on the offensive end from the beginning of the game, outscoring Westminster 17-11 in the first quarter behind Xavier Austin, who contributed six of his team-high 12 points in the opening frame.
The first quarter was somewhat of a back-and-forth tussle between the teams as the Crusaders seemed to be able to play with Port Barre in the early stages.
However, the game's tide would begin to turn in the second quarter as Aymond's group would find its groove in transition, taking advantage of superior athleticism to outscore Westminster 17-8 in the second quarter.
The frame begin with a bang when Markell Sam, the only other Red Devil in double-figures with 10 points, began the scoring for his team with a thunderous transition dunk that seemed to inspire what would end up being the best overall period of basketball the team would play throughout the night as it took a 34-19 lead into halftime.
Seven different Port Barre players would combine on the team's 17 points in the second quarter, a testament to the balance Aymond preaches to his team.
"Sometimes it's really tough because we have a bunch of kids who are scrappers," he said. "You have a couple of kids who chip in two or three points and mix it around. Those are the kinds of games I like, when everyone is getting involved."

description.hltext_display: Dlaczego paliła się kamienica na Jeżycach?
description.content:
- Baliśmy się, że ogień obejmie też nasz budynek - mówią mieszkańcy kamienicy przy Roosevelta 6. Ich obawy są uzasadnione. W poniedziałek wieczorem palił się sąsiedni budynek - przy Roosevelta 8. - Tak naprawdę boimy się już od dawna. Bezdomni koczują w naszej piwnicy. Kręcą się też na działce obok. Jest zima. Nic dziwnego, że chcą się ogrzewać - dodają mieszkańcy i pokazują leżące przy ścianie puste butelki po wódce.
Ogień w stuletniej kamienicy przy Roosevelta 8 pojawił się w poniedziałek o wpół do siódmej wieczorem. Pięć zastępów straży pożarnej w ciągu 5 minut pojawiło się na miejscu. - Gdybyśmy przyjechali pół godziny później, prawdopodobnie zająłby się cały dach - mówił tuż po akcji gaśniczej aspirant sztabowy, Andrzej Pietruszka. A tak na szczęście straty nie są duże. - Spaliło się pomieszczenie na drugiej kondygnacji oraz korytarz prowadzący do pomieszczenia na trzecim piętrze. Było podejrzenie podpalenia, dlatego sprawę oddaliśmy w ręce policji - tłumaczy Michał Kucielski z poznańskiej straży pożarnej. A rzecznik policji, Andrzej Borowiak dodaje: - Cały czas czekamy na ekspertyzę biegłego. Pod uwagę bierzemy zarówno celowe podpalenie, jak i zaprószenie ognia przez osoby postronne.
- Gdyby ktoś chciał dom podpalić, zacząłby od parteru. Skoro ogień pojawił się na drugim piętrze, to podejrzenie tym bardziej pada na bezdomnych. Na drugim piętrze jest najcieplej, tam ich koczuje najwięcej - mówi Piotr Śruba, który niegdyś kamienicą zarządzał, a dziś pośredniczy w jej sprzedaży. I - jak twierdzi - wie o niej najwięcej. - Pod koniec 2005 roku kamienicę kupili Joanna i Piotr Borowiakowie. Ja zajmowałem się papierkową robotą. Większość mieszkań była zajęta, więc rozpoczęły się eksmisje. Wszystkim zapewniliśmy lokale zastępcze. I wystawiliśmy kamienicę na sprzedaż - opowiada Śruba.
Na budynek było trzech kupców. - Inwestor spod Warszawy chciał tu otworzyć hotel w stylu śródziemnomorskim: 30 pokoi w wyższym standardzie, 300 zł za noc, a na dole restauracja. Był już dokładny projekt, zgoda konserwatora zabytków i warunki zabudowy. Ale żeby taki hotel uruchomić, potrzeba ok. 10 mln zł. Inwestor zaczął kalkulować, w końcu odpuścił. Kupnem zainteresował się też pewien Rosjanin - właściciel hurtowni cementu oraz znany poznański deweloper. Ten ostatni oferował za budynek nawet 8,5 mln zł - wspomina Śruba. I dodaje: - Dla Borowiaków kwota ta była za niska. A moim zdaniem był to najlepszy moment na sprzedaż. Nikt nigdy nie chciał dać więcej. Teraz kamienica jest warta 6-7 mln.
Kamienica przy Roosevelta 8 ma 1150 m kw. powierzchni mieszkalnej. Są dwie klatki schodowe: przednia i tylna, trzy piętra i poddasze. A na każdym piętrze po dwa ogromne, 160-metrowe mieszkania. To dlatego planowany hotel pomieściłby aż 30 pokoi. - Dziś bezdomni robią tu melinę. My okna i drzwi zabijamy dechami. A oni tryskają kolejnymi pomysłami, by te blokady pokonać. Podkopują się, w murze wybijają dziury - ubolewa pośrednik. - I znoszą drewno i papier. Palą je, by się ogrzewać. O pożar w takich warunkach łatwo. Tym bardziej że kamienica zbudowana jest z muru pruskiego. To mnóstwo drewna i trzcina w stropach. Takie budynki ogień trawi w mig - zaznacza Śruba.
Co będzie z budynkiem po pożarze? Śruba: - Dokonamy niezbędnych ekspertyz. Ale całkowity remont się nie kalkuluje. To koszt ok. 10 mln zł. Podraża go konieczność wzmocnienia fundamentów. Bo blisko budynku przejeżdża Pestka i pociągi. Powoduje to drgania. Dodatkowo każdy element usuwany i montowany musi być skonsultowany z konserwatorem zabytków.
Piotr Borowiak, właściciel kamienicy, o pożarze dowiedział się w czasie zagranicznych wakacji. Zapewnia, że straty nie są wielkie i że "wszystko jest pod kontrolą".

description.hltext_display: The Citizen examines potential impact of EU-India free trade agreement on HIV/AIDS patients in developing countries
description.author: Editors
description.content:
The Citizen examines the potential impact a free-trade agreement between the EU and India currently under negotiation could have on patients living with HIV/AIDS in developing countries.
The article notes the concerns by some that provisions within the EU-India trade agreement relating to intellectual property (IP) and data exclusivity would result in a restriction of generic drug production, compromising access to low-cost generic drugs, such as antiretrovirals (ARVs). "[M]illions of AIDS patients in the developing world depend on India for generic medicines at affordable costs," Joe Muriuki, the coordinator for Network of African People Living with HIV in East African Region, said Sunday, according to the news service. "Available records show that 92 percent of people living with HIV on treatment in low- and middle-income countries currently use generic antiretroviral (ARVs), mostly manufactured in India," the Citizen writes. According to the article, generic drugs accounted for 90 percent of the ARVs purchased by PEPFAR and 80 percent of the ARVs purchased by Medicines Sans Frontieres (MSF).
The article looks at how the cost associated with treating patients living with HIV/AIDS could rise if access to such drugs was scaled back and includes quotes from Tanzanian Chief Medical Officer in the Ministry of Health and Social Welfare Deo Mtasiwa and Arusha Urban MP Godbless Lema (Ihucha, 12/20).
This article was reprinted from kaiserhealthnews.org with permission from the Henry J. Kaiser Family Foundation. Kaiser Health News, an editorially independent news service, is a program of the Kaiser Family Foundation, a nonpartisan health care policy research organization unaffiliated with Kaiser Permanente.

description.hltext_display: Kto do rady nadzorczej Merkurego?
description.content:
Konkurs ogłoszono po tym, jak we wrześniu Sejm uchwalił nową ustawę medialną. Rozwiązano wtedy radę nadzorczą Polskiego Radia i TVP oraz 17 spółek rozgłośni regionalnych. W przypadku poznańskiego Radia Merkury tworzyli ją ludzie związani z PiS i SLD, którzy pół roku temu wybrali do zarządu Filipa Rdesińskiego (odwołanego już przez KRRiT) i Ryszarda Ćwirleja, który dziś kieruje spółką.
Kandydatów do nowego konkursu zgodnie z owymi zasadami zgłaszały tylko szkoły wyższe. W pierwszym etapie KRRiT oceniła wnioski pod względem formalnym, odrzucono tylko jedną kandydaturę. Wśród osób ubiegających się o stanowisko w radzie nadzorczej Merkurego są b. prezes Merkurego Piotr Frydryszek oraz dotychczasowi członkowie rady Tomasz Naganowski i Jerzy Handschke. O miejsce w radzie ubiegają się także: ekonomiści Jerzy Babiak, Przemysław Bartkiewicz, Stefan Bosiacki i Henryk Mruk, prawnicy Aleksandra Dynowska-Kaźmierska, Marcin Kwapiński i Norbert Gill, historyk Bogusław Bojczuk, politolodzy Piotr Michalak i Krzysztof Paluszyński, polonista Bogdan Poniedziałek i medioznawca Jędrzej Skrzypczak. Jest także dziennikarz Piotr Talaga z "Głosu Wielkopolskiego" oraz Marek Patelka, kierownik ekonomiczny poznańskiego oddziału TVP.
Przesłuchania zaplanowano na początek stycznia, najprawdopodobniej odbędą się w Poznaniu.

description.hltext_display: Cooper Remains At Outperform
Papa John's raises franchise incentives
description.content:
Wal-Mart opens store on Arkansas campus
Wal-Mart is going collegiate. The "Walmart on Campus" store at the University of Arkansas appears part of a series of tests of smaller-format stores for the giant retailer. The 10,000-square-foot space under development replaces a university-run pharmacy. Walmart on Campus is expected to open by next month when classes resume at the university, though it will also be open for nonstudents. In a release, the university said patients have the option of moving their prescriptions to the Walmart on Campus pharmacy or another store. Walmart plans to try a wide variety of "small-store" formats that will allow it to expand to places its supercenters -- often around 200,000 square feet in the past or even around the 180,000 square feet in the current configuration -- won't fit or can't get zoning.
Papa John’s has announced its 2011 Development Incentive Program, appealing to potential franchisees willing to grow with the company. Qualifying restaurants opening in the United States in 2011 in the best-of-class program can receive: no franchise fee ($25,000 value); two Middleby-Marshall ovens, which may be purchased by the franchisee for $50 after operating for two years; a royalty waiver for up to 12 months; and a $3,000 food credit with PJ Food Service, which operates Papa John's fresh dough and food distribution quality control centers, for each restaurant that opens at least 30 days prior to the scheduled opening date. These incentives are available for new unit development agreements signed by qualifying franchisees through Oct. 31, 2011. Openings must be in 2011.
First Merrell store opens in Australia
RCG Corporation has launched the first Australian flagship store for the Merrell brand. The group, which operates The Athlete's Foot chain of footwear stores in the country, became the Australian distributor for Merrell on January 1 this year. The company also opened a new store for its Shoe Superstore business in Lane Cove, Sydney.
Lightning Bolt opens flagshop in Venice
In anticipation of its 40th anniversary, Lightning Bolt officially opened the doors to its first ever flagship store in Venice, Calif. This is the first stand-alone branded shop since the original store in Honolulu during the 70s. The Lightning Bolt store is an industrial space showcasing Lightning Bolt tees, shorts, sweats and surfboards. While shopping, consumers can enjoy the nostalgia photos and posters from the early days when Lightning Bolt was first launched in Hawaii in 1971.
-- Posted December 20, 2010
Canada's foodservice sector outpacing U.S.
Restaurant chains are spreading throughout Canada faster than they are in the U.S. According to a study by Technomic, the Canadian restaurant industry has achieved a higher growth rate in 2010 than its U.S. counterpart, and that growth is expected to continue throughout 2011.
This is after the country experienced a 1.2 percent decline in unit counts in 2009. With the growth comes increased competition in all restaurant segments, as well as more product innovations making their way onto menus.
Some Canadian foodservice trends to watch include: U.S. chains have their eye on the Canadian border; the Canadian market is appealing because it is not yet saturated, and close proximity makes it easier for development and management; the fast casual segment will become more ubiquitous in 2011, with growth from both Canadian and U.S.-based chains; and Canadians are seeking new dining experiences that feature ethnic cuisines such as Korean, Southeast Asian and Mexican.
Crocs expands into Puerto Rico
Crocs, Inc. announced its expansion into Puerto Rico with new store locations. Opening this month, the Plaza Las Americas store, located in Hato Rey, and Plaza Carolina store, located in San Juan, join the Barceloneta and Old San Juan locations, which opened earlier this year to mark its first retail venture into Puerto Rico. Crocs expects to operate more than 400 company owned retail stores in shopping destinations around the globe by year-end.
-- Posted December 17, 2010
McDonald's plans major push in China
McDonald’s Corp. plans to increase investment in China by 40 percent next year and open 175 to 200 stores, according to a statement distributed before a briefing in Beijing Wednesday. China is the company’s fastest growing market in terms of new store openings, McDonald’s said. The company increased investment in the nation by 25 percent this year and will open 165 new restaurants, it said.
Whole Foods cited for LEED excellence
Whole Foods Market’s store in Lake Grove, Ill., is the first supermarket in the United States to be awarded with both a LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) Gold certification from the U.S. Green Building Council. It also received a Three Green Globe certification from the Green Building Initiative. The store, which opened in March 2010, is the third of Whole Foods Market’s 22 locations in the Northeast region to receive a LEED certification, and the first to be recognized by the Green Building Initiative.
Fresh & Easy goes solar with Arizona stores
Fresh & Easy Neighborhood Market has partnered with REC Solar, a leading solar electric system provider in the United States, to install roof-mount solar systems on nine stores in Arizona. The installation will begin in March 2011. The combined 410 kW of installed solar systems will produce an estimated 620,000 kilowatt-hours (kWh) annually, the equivalent of reducing 22 million lbs. of CO2 emissions – or removing 28 million car-driven miles – over the next 25 years. Fresh & Easy has invested in one of California’s largest solar roof installations on its distribution center in Riverside, Calif. The installation, which is more than 500,000 square feet, currently produces about one-fifth of the energy for the entire facility.
-- Posted December 16, 2010
Holiday sales rising faster than expected
U.S. retail sales will climb more than anticipated this holiday season as shoppers snap up gifts at the last minute, according to an industry index. Sales in the week ended Dec. 11 rose 0.8 percent, according to the ICSC-Goldman Sachs Weekly Chain Store Sales Index. Same- store sales at some U.S. retailers may rise as much as 4 percent in November and December, compared with an earlier projection of up to 3.5 percent, according to a statement today. Last week comparable-store sales rose 3.1 percent from a year ago, according to the index.
Dollar General set to revamp DG market
Dollar General plans to revitalize and eventually expand its DG Market format, a test concept that debuted in 2003 but was put on hold in 2007 while the chain’s new management focused on its core stores. Company officials said three of the 57 DG Markets have been remerchandised and received new layouts and design schemes, with the result that all three are experiencing strong sales growth. Next year the chain will continue to remodel and remerchandise the remaining DG Markets. Dollar General also plans to open approximately 625 new stores and remodel or relocate approximately 550 in fiscal 2011. The company will expand into three new states, Nevada, New Hampshire and Connecticut.
IHOP expanding into New York City
IHOP Corp. is expanding into the New York City area with a deal to build and develop 24 locations in the metro area, including Manhattan, Queens and a flagship locale in Times Square. The development of these traditional-style IHOP family restaurant sites is part of the company’s strategy to expand its presence to accommodate existing customers and lure new ones. In November, IHOP opened the doors of its 1,500th location, just one of approximately 60 restaurants that have debuted this year.
-- Posted December 15, 2010
Dunkin' Donuts growing in Georgia, Detroit
Dunkin’ Donuts, which is in the middle of an aggressive expansion plan that has included 338 new openings this year, has signed a store development agreement with three franchisees to develop six more restaurants in the Detroit area within the next several years. This is the fourth deal in 2010 in that market. Under the plan, three units will open in 2011, with the remaining set to open by 2014. The Detroit area currently is home to 56 Dunkin’ Donuts locations. Additionally, Dunkin’ Donuts has signed a multi-unit store development agreement to open four new restaurants in the Athens, Ga. market. The deal, with brothers David and Mark Weeks, includes one opening in 2012, and the other three by 2015.
Two restaurant chains set sights on D-FW
The Dallas-Fort Worth area is gaining two restaurant chains, thanks to Tasti D-Lite and Elevation Burgers. Tasti D-Lite plans to open 25 locations, while Elevation Burger plans for three.
-- Posted December 14, 2010
World's largest H&M store opens in Vegas
The Swedish clothing retailer will open its doors in the recently closed FAO Schwarz location at the Forum Shops at Caesars. The three-level, 55,000-square-foot store will house women’s, men’s and children’s clothing, shoes and accessories. The store was scheduled to open last month, but the opening was postponed for unknown reasons. The H&M Forum Shops location was picked to be one of a handful of U.S. stores to carry a limited edition line of clothing from luxury brand Lanvin when it was released last month, scheduled to correspond with the store’s original opening date. While the line quickly sold out in other U.S. stores, the new Forum Shops H&M will be the last location in the world to carry the line. Las Vegas already is home to two H&M locations — one at Town Square and one at the Miracle Mile Shops.
-- Posted December 13, 2010
KFC eyes potential in Africa
After spending two decades introducing fried chicken and pizza to Chinese consumers, Yum Brands Inc. now sees Africa as its next international jewel. By 2014, the Louisville, Ky., restaurant-holding company expects to double its number of KFC outlets in Africa to 1,200. In the next four years, it aims to more than double its revenue on the continent to $2 billion. The improved political stability of various African governments, the region's vast population and a growing middle class in Africa—where chicken is a dietary staple—led Yum to set its sights on the continent. The first KFC in South Africa opened in 1971 and Yum, whose brands also include Pizza Hut, Taco Bell and Long John Silver's, is now branching out into Nigeria, Namibia, Mozambique, Ghana, Zambia and other African countries.
Dunkin' Donuts growing in Milwaukee area
Dunkin’ Donuts has signed development agreements with the Milwaukee Coffee Brewing Co. (MCBC). The deal includes a plan to open 36 new restaurants in the central and southern parts of Milwaukee. MCBC currently runs more than 370 Dunkin’ Donuts restaurants in metro and upstate New York, Massachusetts, Pennsylvania, New Jersey and Connecticut. Theagreement is part of a strategic growth plan by Dunkin’ Donuts to expand through existing markets and enter new cities. It has opened about 340 locations worldwide this year, with about one-fourth of those in the United States. Additionally, 72 new domestic development commitments have been signed. Dunkin’ Donuts also seeks franchisees to develop restaurants in other parts of Wisconsin, including Green Bay and LaCrosse.
-- Posted December 10, 2010
Panera to open 1st Brooklyn location
Panera Bread is opening a new restaurant in downtown Brooklyn in the chain’s first foray into the borough. The bakery and café will occupy 2,200 square feet on the ground floor and 2,300 square feet on the second floor, which was being used for offices. The 29-year-old chain boasts 26 locations in Long Island, Queens and Staten Island but none in Manhattan. The company has more than 1,400 company-owned and franchise-operated locations in 40 states and in Ontario.
Golden Chick set to expand into China
Texas. Oklahoma. China? That's right, the Golden Chick, which maintains a philosophy of controlled, concentric, regional growth, is looking to expand into China sometime next year. Golden Chick officials secured the rights to open Golden Chick restaurants in 10 Asian countries. Today, the Dallas-based restaurant chain operates 90 units (86 franchises).
-- Posted December 9, 2010
White Castle unveils 3 fast casual styles
White Castle is testing a trio of fast-casual restaurant concepts that could help the nation’s oldest quick-service burger chain decide whether to branch off in new directions. The Columbus, Ohio–based icon, known for its little hamburgers affectionately dubbed sliders, housed the three new restaurants in rebuilt, redesigned White Castle units. The new concepts are: Deckers, a sandwich shop headlined by triple-decker grilled sandwiches, soups, and salads, located in Lebanon, Tennessee, near Nashville; Blaze Modern BBQ, a contemporary barbecue joint that offers slow-cooked meats, updated traditional sides, and imaginative sauces. It is in Lafayette, Indiana, an hour north of Indianapolis; and Laughing Noodle, featuring various noodle dishes, soups, and upscale salads, in Springfield, Ohio, a community outside Dayton.
-- Posted December 8, 2010
Retail sales jump 6% in November
Lured by steep discounts, shoppers stormed retail doors in November. But to keep the momentum going, merchants must keep the discounts coming. Sales were strong across the board at discounters, department stores and specialty apparel stores alike. All told, more than three-fourths of retailers beat expectations in November, according to Thomson Reuters, which tallied the results of 27 major chains.
The 6 percent increase over November 2009 was the biggest year-over-year gain for the crucial shopping month since 2007, as well as another sign of growing consumer confidence. And unlike the past two years, when frugal consumers shopped mainly for discounts, retailers reported that sales were strong throughout the month, with shoppers picking up more discretionary items, splurging on themselves and more willing to pay full price.
The results surprised analysts who had predicted a modest, 3.6 percent rise. They attributed the gains to earlier-than-ever holiday promotions, improving economic conditions and pent-up demand by consumers. Retail experts say a good holiday season could speed up the nation's tepid recovery because consumer spending accounts for nearly 70 percent of U.S. economic activity.
-- Posted December 7, 2010
REI to open sixth store in D.C. area
REI (Recreational Equipment, Inc.) plans to open a new store in Woodbridge, Va. at Stonebridge at Potomac Town Center in the spring of 2012. The two-story, 25,000 square-foot store will join REI’s five other locations in the Washington, D.C. area, including Bailey's Crossroads, Va., College Park, Md., Columbia, Md., Fairfax, Va. and Rockville, Md. REI operates 114 retail stores nationwide and two online stores.
Memphis retailer opens TNF shop in house
Outdoors Inc finished development on Memphis’ only North Face Summit Specialty Shop within their location on Germantown Parkway this month. The North Face Summit dealers are chosen to have the most product knowledge and widest assortment of clothing, outerwear, footwear and equipment. The Summit Shop is 400 square feet and includes all new fixtures and extensive products that cannot be found in other North Face dealers in Memphis. This is the only Summit Specialty Shop within 200 miles. Outdoors Inc has a long-standing relationship with The North Face as a premiere dealer for the last 32 years. Outdoors Inc is a local outdoor gear and clothing shop in Memphis, Tenn. that has been outfitting human-powered recreation since 1974.
-- Posted December 6, 2010
Retail space back in demand in 2011
Heading into the New Year on a high note, CBRE Econometric Advisors (CBRE-EA) is predicting retail demand for space will be positive for the first time since 2007. Following is some highlights culled from the report.
If the new analysis is on target, vacancy is expected to drop to 12.7 percent by the end of 2011; it was 13 percent at the end of Q3 2010. The uptick will be supported by the ongoing pick-up in retail sales and limited supply, according to CBRE-EA.
Researchers believe the increase will be "modest" and high availability will pressure rents until 2012 when owners should finally have enough momentum to increase rents. The forecast claims historic rent growths of more than 3 percent won't return until 2013.
CBRE-EA credited developers with forward-thinking practices that kept new space at a minimum. The construction constraint will be a long-term, positive contributor to retail real estate's recovery. Malls, neighborhood and community centers reflected 0.5 percent and 1.5 percent of supply growth during the downturn. In the next two years, supply growth is projected to be just 1 percent, well below its level between 2000 and 2008.
Starbuck reveals more growth plans
Starbucks plans to use the strength from its core business for an ambitious international growth strategy. Starbucks recently has increased its presence in Canada, Japan and emerging markets such as China, Brazil, India and Russia. The company also said it hopes to have 1,500 stores on the mainland of China by 2015. Starbucks also plans to improve its U.S. retail operations by adding mobile payment options and improving the way it serves customers during peak hours. The company is also looking at opening smaller cafes and being choosier about when and where it opens new stores.
-- Posted December 3, 2010
Nordstrom Rack to open in Tigard, Ore.
Nordstrom plans to open a new Rack discount store next fall in the Portland suburb of Tigard, Ore. The retailer said the new 45,000-square-foot store will open in Cascade Plaza in Tigard, about a mile away from a full-line Nordstrom store in the Washington Square shopping center. Cascade Plaza is a mixed-use center that includes 130,000 square-foot of retail space and 200,000 square-foot of office space. The center's retail mix also includes David's Bridal, Burlington Coat Factory, Ross and Best Buy.
Tesco to open 100 stores in Poland in 2011
Tesco has announced plans to double the number of its new stores in Poland in the next financial year which starts in March 2011. Tesco which proposes to open 50 new stores in the current financial year, plans to open 100 new stores in 2011.
A detailed store-opening plan will be revealed after the closure of budget in April 2011. The retailer currently operates 326 stores in Poland.
-- Posted December 2, 2010
Consumer confidence soars
Things are looking up, as optimism about the U.S. economy grew in November. The latest numbers on consumer sentiment are the highest level since June. The Consumer Confidence Index rose to 54.1 in November, up from a negatively revised 49.9 in October, according to the Conference Board, a New York-based research group that compiles the index. Economists were expecting the index to increase to 52. The percentage of Americans expecting business conditions to pick up over the next several months increased to 16.7 percent from 15.8 percent last month, and fewer expected circumstances to worsen. Consumers were also more positive about job prospects, with 15.5 percent expecting more jobs in the months ahead, up from 14.5 percent. And over 10 percent are anticipating a boost in their incomes.
-- Posted December 1, 2010

description.hltext_display: 新闻出版总署：汉语出版物禁随意夹带外文
description.content:
标签： 汉语出版物 新闻出版总署 语言文字 字体
摘要：本报讯（记者于梦江）昨日，记者从新闻出版总署了解到，新闻出版总署日前下发的《关于进一步规范出版物文字使用的通知》（以下简称《通知》）要求正确规范使用汉字，对违反使用语言文字规范的，要责令改正...
本报讯 （记者于梦江）昨日，记者从新闻出版总署了解到，新闻出版总署日前下发的《关于进一步规范出版物文字使用的通知》（以下简称《通知》）要求正确规范使用汉字，对违反使用语言文字规范的，要责令改正，依法予以行政处罚。
非中非外有不良影响
据了解，目前，在报纸、期刊、图书、音像制品和电子书、互联网等各类出版物中，外国语言文字使用量剧增，出现了在汉语言中随意夹杂英语等外来语、直接使用英文单词或字母缩写、生造一些非中非外、含义不清的词语等滥用语言文字的问题，严重损害了汉语言文字的规范性和纯洁性，破坏了和谐健康的语言文化环境，造成了不良的社会影响。
对此，《通知》要求出版媒体和出版单位要采取有效措施，严格执行“报纸、期刊、图书、音像制品等出版物的报头(名)、刊名、封皮(包括封面、封底、书脊等)、包装装饰物、广告宣传品等用字，必须使用规范汉字，禁止使用不规范汉字。出版物的内文(包括正文、内容提要、目录以及版权记录项目等辅文)，必须使用规范汉字，禁止使用不规范汉字”等有关条款，为促进汉语言文字的规范化和健康发展发挥示范带头作用。
禁止随意颠倒词序
在汉语出版物中，禁止出现随意夹带使用英文单词或字母缩写等外国语言文字；禁止生造非中非外、含义不清的词语；禁止任意增减外文字母、颠倒词序等违反语言规范现象。汉语出版物中需要使用外国语言文字的，应当用国家通用语言文字作必要的注释。外国语言文字的翻译应当符合翻译的基本原则和惯例。外国人名、地名等专有名词和科学技术术语要按有关规定翻译成国家通用语言文字。
同时，《通知》要求各级新闻出版行政部门要进一步加强对出版物语言文字使用及质量的管理和检查。将出版物使用语言文字情况，尤其是使用外语规范情况作为出版物质量检查和年度核验的重要内容，并将其纳入日常审读范围。对违反使用语言文字规范的，要依法予以行政处罚。
对于这一规定，网友“ls”说：“中国几千年的文明得以延续，文字在其中起到了巨大的传承作用，严重支持此项规定，否则将有被外来文化侵略，甚至同化的可能。”山东烟台市网友说：“该规范一下了，现在的出版物里，到处充斥着错别字、不规范的文字，必须整顿。”
相关新闻
广电总局要求
央视等媒体不再使用NBA等缩略词
本报讯 央视体育频道总监江和平证实，广电总局一周前向央视等媒体下发通知，要求在主持人口播、记者采访和字幕中，不能再使用诸如NBA、GDP、WTO、CPI等外语和缩略词。江和平称，这一通知对央视的解说员和记者来说，规避起来比较简单。
从这个月起，央视体育新闻已经在节目中开始规避“NBA”、“CBA”、“F1”等观众耳熟能详的缩略词，取而代之的是“美国职业篮球联赛”、“中国男子篮球联赛”、“一级方程式赛车锦标赛”等中文全称。
央视体育频道总监江和平确认，广电总局上周下发了一道通知，要求在今后的电视节目中尽量屏蔽英文缩略词，转而使用中文全称。目前，央视、北京电视台等媒体的多档节目已就此进行整改。
江和平说：“不仅是体育频道要执行这个通知，央视的所有频道都要执行，例如GDP、WTO、CPI这类缩写也在禁用范围内。”

description.hltext_display: Gwiazdor pomógł matce w ucieczce
description.content:
- Ho, ho, ho, ho - słychać już zza drzwi. Półtoraroczna Oliwia z zaciekawieniem przygląda się ubranej na czerwono postaci z wielką białą brodą. Jest za mała, by powiedzieć "gwiazdor". Schodzi z kolan mamy, by się przywitać. Już, już jest blisko, już prawie ciągnie go za brodę. W ostatniej chwili ucieka z powrotem do mamy.
Pani Alicja mieszka z córeczką w barakach na Świerczewie. Niewielki domek, z węglowym piecem, pozbawiony wentylacji. Na ścianach i na suficie czarne plamy grzyba. - Już pisałam do administracji, mają coś z tym zrobić - tłumaczy pani Alicja. Lokal w baraku dostały od miasta jako mieszkanie socjalne.
Oliwka powoli przekonuje się do Gwiazdora. Postać siada na przygotowanym krześle i zaczyna wyciągać z wielkiego worka prezenty. Jest tu lalka: gadająca i mrugająca oczami. Jest różowa puchowa kurtka na zimę, ciepłe zimowe buciki. - Mam coś jeszcze - Gwiazdor uchyla drzwi. Do pokoju wjeżdża różowy rower, z przeciwdeszczową budką, z kierownicą w kształcie misia.
Gwiazdora wysłała do Oliwki posłanka Krystyna Łybacka, która kolejny raz bierze udział w akcji Zostań Gwiazdorem organizowanej przez "Gazetę" i Krajowe Stowarzyszenie Resocjalizacji. - Zależało mi, by dziecko odwiedził prawdziwy Gwiazdor, wniósł trochę radości. By nie było to zwykłe przekazanie prezentów - opowiada Łybacka.
Dlatego szef biura poselskiego Ryszard Zaczyński pożyczył od sąsiada czerwony kubrak, spodnie, czapkę, kędzierzawą brodę, białe futerko na buty. - Jestem przyzwyczajony do odtwarzania różnych postaci, biorę udział w rekonstrukcjach historycznych. Raz jestem Prusakiem, raz powstańcem wielkopolskim. Gwiazdorem być najprzyjemniej - tłumaczy w sieni, odczepiając sobie brodę.
Tymczasem w pokoju pani Alicja w pośpiechu pakuje rzeczy, ubiera córeczkę. Jest przerażona. Przed chwilą zadzwonił ojciec Oliwki: przyznaje, że jest pijany, mówi, że wkrótce będzie w domu. Kurator Roman Fons próbuje dodzwonić się do dzielnicowego. Bez skutku. - Partner pani Alicji ma wyrok w zawieszeniu za znęcanie się nad rodziną. Bił mamę Oliwki, gonił ją z siekierą - tłumaczy kurator. Tata Oliwki na trzeźwo jest spokojny. Właśnie w dniu odwiedzin Gwiazdora postanowił się upić.
- Do mojego samochodu bez problemu zmieści się i pani Alicja, i wózek - natychmiast deklaruje Zaczyński. W drodze nie kryje zdenerwowania: - Przecież tam natychmiast powinna się pojawić policja, zatrzymać faceta, sąd powinien odwiesić mu wyrok!
- Taki mechanizm przewiduje ustawa o przeciwdziałaniu przemocy w rodzinie - przyznaje poseł Łybacka. - Tak się cieszyłyśmy po jej uchwaleniu... To był czołowy projekt Izy Jarugi-Nowackiej. Niestety, odpowiedni minister nie wydał rozporządzeń wykonawczych. Ofiara wciąż jest słabsza od sprawcy.
Tego dnia Gwiazdor sprawdził się w innej niż zwykle roli: odwiózł panią Alicję w bezpieczne miejsce, skąd pojechała do swojej mamy. - Ale to nie tak miało być... - wzdycha Łybacka. O sytuacji małej Oliwki rozmawiała już z rzecznikiem praw dziecka. Pisze interpelację do ministra sprawiedliwości.
W środę wysłany przez nią Gwiazdor odwiedzi kolejne dziecko.

description.hltext_display: 古い鉢の土を再生
description.content:
【すっきり年越し】（５）古い鉢の土 ほぐし、ふるい、混ぜて再生 田中さん（右）の指導で土をふるう。「硬い土が軟らかくなり驚きました」と高田さん（横浜市で）＝若杉和希撮影 ベランダ園芸を楽しむ人が増えているが、花や収穫が終わった後の土だけの鉢やプランターを放置していないだろうか。
園芸研究家の田中哲さんは「大掃除の際にひと手間かけ、 させてみませんか」と提案する。
再生法を教わるのは、横浜市の主婦高田美可子さん（５４）。自宅のウッドデッキのバルコニーで、植物栽培を楽しんでいる。「園芸店に出かけるたび、つい新しい鉢植えを買ってしまう。古い鉢の土をどうすればいいのか悩んでいました」
田中さんによると、植物を育てた後の鉢の土は、養分が失われている上に硬くなっている。そのままでは植物を育てるのには向かない。試しに、直径３０センチの古い鉢をひっくり返してみた。土はこちこちに固まっており、植物の根も残り、土は全く落ちてこない。
田中さんの指導で、この鉢の土の再生作業に取りかかる。まず園芸用移植ゴテなど道具を使って鉢から土を掘り出す。土はほぐし、ブルーシートの上に落としていく。
続いて土を少量ずつふるいにかける。「粗い目のふるいで。根やゴミを除くのが目的です」。今回は９ミリの目のふるいを使った。「力がいる作業で疲れますが頑張って」と田中さん。小指の先ほどの何かの幼虫を発見。「古い土には虫がいることもある。見つけ次第、取り除いてください」
レジャーナイフ（中央）も硬い土をほぐすのに便利 こちこちだった土は、さらさらの状態になった。これなら何か植えることができそう。だが、田中さんは「さらさらの土は粘土のようなもので、再度固まってしまいやすく、水はけも良くない」という。
そこで購入した腐葉土を３割ほど混ぜる。高田さんは手袋をはめて、土をすくいあげてはこぼすようにして、空気を含ませながら、しっかり混ぜ込んだ。土はふんわりと膨らんだように見えてきた。「あんなに硬かったのに、不思議ですね」と高田さん。さらに、ゆっくり成分が溶ける緩効性の化学肥料も混ぜ、土の再生は完了した。
再生した土は肥料などを混ぜたとはいえ、新品の園芸土と比べれば養分のバランスがあまりよくない。また植物の病害虫が残っている心配もある。「簡易的な再生と考えてください」。だから、たくさんの養分が必要な、実のなる植物の栽培は避けた方がいい。
お薦めは、パンジーやビオラといった一年草の栽培だ。今の時期でも花の付いた苗が販売されている。寒さに強く、正月のベランダやバルコニーを彩ってくれそうだ。チューリップなどの球根を植えて、春を待つのもいい。「再生した土で新しい花を育ててみたくなりました」と高田さん。田中さんは「これならできる人も多いのでは。気軽に楽しんでみてください」と話す。（崎長敬志）
（2010年12月22日 読売新聞）

description.hltext_display: Hilton Worldwide Signs Multi-Year Agreement with Tata Consultancy Services
description.author: DubaiChronicle.com
description.content:
Print Post
Email Post
Hilton Worldwide, the leading global hospitality company, and Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), (BSE: 532540) (NSE: TCS), a leading IT services, consulting and business solutions firm, today announced a multi-year agreement to help accelerate and enhance Hilton Worldwide’s technology strategy as part of the Hilton Worldwide Innovation Collaborative.
The Innovation Collaborative will evolve Hilton Worldwide’s technology infrastructure and accelerate innovation across the company’s portfolio of ten brands. TCS will leverage its extensive experience in running large transformational initiatives and modernizing legacy systems to help develop a platform that keeps Hilton Worldwide in the forefront of the business and technology landscape.
“Our goal is to continue our strong history of innovation by working with the best technology leaders,” said Robert Webb, chief information officer, Hilton Worldwide. “As a partner in our Innovation Collaborative, TCS has demonstrated its commitment to help us meet our business objectives and continues to deliver world-class services.”
“We are excited to be a part of Hilton Worldwide’s vision for growth,” said N. Chandrasekaran, TCS’ CEO and MD. “This relationship confirms our leadership position as the long-term IT partner best equipped to help global corporations transform their businesses using our full-service capabilities and domain knowledge. We are committed to furthering Hilton Worldwide’s strategic and transformational initiatives through the most advanced technology solutions.”
TCS is spearheading the transformation and management of a core group of application platforms, which will deliver enhanced product offerings. To better align technology solutions to the businesses’ needs and to ensure Hilton Worldwide remains the leading innovator in hospitality, TCS is managing the corporate suite of applications in the areas of property information management, learning management, quality assurance, business intelligence, financial systems and intranet applications.

description.hltext_display: 北韓反艦與對空導彈上架 南韓緊繃
description.content:
南韓昨日於延坪島進行砲擊演習，北韓在沈寂一天後，在西海岸前線，增設反艦導彈、地對空導彈，且部分導彈並已上到發射架，可隨時待命發射，南韓已下令在非軍事區的部隊保持最高警戒狀態。
南韓在延坪島實施砲擊訓練，北韓暫無動作，不過一天後，在西海岸登山岬一帶，增設包括SA-2地對空導彈、蠶式地對艦導彈，同時在白翎島、江華島北側一帶所部署的多管火箭砲並未撤回，仍保持隨時射擊態勢。
SA-2地對空導彈的射程為30至40公里，能夠威脅到在西海北方界線（NLL）附近執行任務的南韓戰斗機，而蠶式地對艦導彈程為83至95公里，南韓驅逐艦則駛離導彈射程範圍。
今日起，南韓海軍艦隊也在東海，實施為期4天的機動演習，南韓軍方並下令西海5島、非軍事區等部隊，保持最高警戒狀態，並嚴防北韓對這些地區發動攻擊。
南韓軍方強調，如果北韓發動攻擊，將會果敢反擊。

description.hltext_display: Poznańskie wigilie dla wszystkich
description.content:
"Cicha Noc" zaśpiewana po chińsku, czerwony barszcz oraz świąteczny opłatek - czekają na poznaniaków, którzy przyjdą w piątek o godz. 20.30 na 19. Wigilię pod Rondem. Spotkanie potrwa półtorej godziny, dzięki czemu poznaniacy zdążą na pasterkę.
Pod rondem kolędować będą poznańscy artyści i sportowcy. Kaponiera tradycyjnie będzie udekorowana choinkami, a na dzieci będzie czekała 10-metrowa kolorowanka z bajkowymi postaciami.
Wcześniej, bo o godz. 17.30 rozpocznie się wigilia organizowana przez Fundację Barka. - Przenosimy się ze Starego Rynku do naszej siedziby przy ul. św. Wincentego na Śródce - mówi Edward Skoryna.
Na teren MTP przeniesie się z kolei wigilia Caritasu dla bezdomnych, głodnych, starszych, chorych i samotnych. Dotychczas odbywała się na Grunwaldzie, w siedzibie XI LO. Spotkanie rozpocznie się o godz. 11 i potrwa co najmniej trzy godziny.

description.hltext_display: 中国70%桥梁不合通航标准 航道立法列日程
description.content:
标签： 通航标准 桥梁 立法 字体
摘要：《航道法》已被国务院列入立法计划本报讯正在长江航道调研的国务院法制办副主任安建表示，中国长江等内河水运的低成本、大运量、节能环保优势日渐凸显，但现行法规对航道资源缺乏相应保护制度...
《航道法》已被国务院列入立法计划
本报讯 正在长江航道调研的国务院法制办副主任安建表示，中国长江等内河水运的低成本、大运量、节能环保优势日渐凸显，但现行法规对航道资源缺乏相应保护制度，《航道法》目前已被国务院列入立法计划，目前正在积极稳步推进。
据介绍，中国水运资源丰富，流域面积在1000平方公里以上的河流有5800多条，总里程42万公里。长江水系、珠江水系、淮河水系、黑龙江水系以及18000公里海岸线，都具有发展水运的优越自然条件。不过，由于现行法规对航道资源缺乏相应保护制度，对建设与通航有关的建筑物缺乏有效监管，已建成的桥梁、拦河闸坝等碍航建筑物对航道资源造成损害。
目前，全国航道上共建有桥梁40972座，其中不满足航道通航标准的桥梁占70%；全国航道上共建有水利水电枢纽4134座，其中建有船闸、升船机等过船设施的仅有860座，造成航道中断4万余公里。加之航道上乱采滥挖砂石现象严重，“超吃水”违章航行和盗窃航道设施等行为屡禁不止，已经造成通航条件的恶化。
为了从法规层面解决影响中国内河水运发展的问题，交通运输部从1990年就开始着手《航道法》的起草工作，安建副主任表示，目前，《航道法》已被国务院列入立法计划，正积极稳步推进。

description.hltext_display: Planned suit calls for return of wolves across US
description.content:
BILLINGS — Environmentalists said Tuesday they intend to sue the Obama administration to force it to restore gray wolves across the lower 48 states — even as Republicans in Congress sought unsuccessfully to strip the animals of protection.
The Center for Biological Diversity said in a formal notice to the Interior Department that it will sue the agency in 60 days unless the government crafts a plan to bring back wolves throughout their historical range.
“Wolves once roamed nearly the whole country and down into Mexico, but at this point they’re just in a fraction of that range,” said Noah Greenwald, director of endangered species for the Center for Biological Diversity.
About 6,000 wolves live in the lower 48 states. They are protected from hunting except in Alaska.
Biologists for the Arizona-based group argue there is enough wild habitat to support thousands of wolves in New England and New York, the southern Rocky Mountains, parts of Colorado and the Cascade Range of Oregon and Washington.
But prospects for new wolf packs in other parts of the country are uncertain at best, given how polarized the debate over wolves has become in recent months.
Like the Bush administration, the Obama administration has pushed to end federal protections for wolves and turn over control of the animals to states. Lawmakers from states where wolves already roam say there are too many of the predators.
On Tuesday, Sen. Mike Crapo, R-Idaho, tried to force a full Senate vote on a bill to strip wolves nationwide of federal protections.
The measure was backed by Republicans in Wyoming and Utah, but failed in the face of Democratic objections.
Wolves were poisoned and trapped to near-extermination in the United States in the last century. They have bounced back in some wilderness areas over the last few decades, in part through government-sponsored reintroduction programs.
Crapo said the growing population of wolves in the Northern Rockies — more than 1,700 at the end of 2009 — was harming big game herds and domestic livestock.
“The longer we wait to resolve this issue, the more difficult it’s going to be,” he said.
But Sen. Benjamin Cardin, a Maryland Democrat, said the Republican bill would undermine the Endangered Species Act. He criticized what he called an attempt “to solve politically what should be done by good science.”
Cardin suggested he would support a compromise pushed by Montana lawmakers and the administration that would limit the scope of the bill to include only wolves in the Northern Rockies.
Crapo said that proposal was unacceptable because it would have forced Idaho to change the way it manages the animals.
Public hunts for wolves were allowed briefly in Montana, Idaho and Wyoming in recent years. Those were halted after the federal government was rebuffed by the courts in several attempts to take the animal off the endangered list.
Judges have ruled that the government has not proved existing wolf numbers would ensure the population’s long-term survival.
Wolves are notorious predators. Experts say they could survive in most of the country if they were allowed. But a hunger for livestock often gets the animals into trouble, particularly in the Northern Rockies where ranches and wolf territories often overlap.
Young adult wolves sometimes travel hundreds of miles when looking to establish a new territory. In the last several years, packs have gained a toehold in parts of Oregon and Washington. Others have been spotted in Colorado, Utah and northern New England.
“We’ve learned from where wolves have been reintroduced that they have a tremendous benefit,” Greenwald, of the Center for Biological Diversity, said. “They force elk to move around more, which allows riparian vegetation to come back and increases songbirds, and they control coyote populations.”
The U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service is currently analyzing research into wolf genetics to see how populations in different parts of the country relate to one another.
Agency spokesman Chris Tollefson on Tuesday said the effort is not part of a nationwide recovery plan, but declined to say if it could be used for such an effort in the future.
He said results of the agency’s work are expected in early 2011.
“It’s designed to establish the best scientific foundation to make future management decisions about wolves. That’s about all I can say about it at this point,” Tollefson said.
Matthew Daly contributed to this story from Washington, D.C.
