description.hltext_display: Breast-fed boys score higher on some tests
description.content:
LOS ANGELES - Breast-feeding infants for at least six months appears to give children an advantage in school, according to a study published in the journal Pediatrics.
Many other studies have also found a small effect on school performance from breast-feeding. This study, published Monday, was unique in that boys appeared to benefit the most.
The researchers, from the University of Western Australia in Perth, have followed 2,868 children since the early '90s. The study showed that, at age 10, boys who were breast-fed for six months or longer scored higher in math, reading and spelling compared with boys who were breast-fed for less than six months.
Girls who were breast-fed for at least six months showed a small improvement in reading. The researchers controlled for other factors that could influence school performance, such as family income and education and how often the child was read to.
Breast milk is rich in long-chain, polyunsaturated fatty acids that are critical to brain development. It's not clear why boys showed the largest gains from being breast-fed, but the authors explain that male babies are known to be more vulnerable in infancy than females. They speculate that breast-feeding "accelerates the rate of maturation in boys."
Boys may also benefit more from the mother-child relationship facilitated by breast-feeding.
"A number of studies have revealed that male infants are more reliant than female infants on maternal attention and encouragement for the acquisition of cognitive and language skills," the authors wrote.

entity.property: University of Western Australia in Perth

description.hltext_display: AdvisorShares' Latest: An Active ETF Option for Junk Bond Exposure
description.author: Jared Cummans
description.content:
The ETF industry took flight nearly two decades ago, an addition to the investing landscape spurred by disappointment with traditional actively managed mutual funds and interest in developing more flexible tools consistent with an index-based strategy. Though the very first ETF was built with traders in mind, ETFs quickly emerged as an ideal fixture for buy and hold portfolios. ETFs have exploded onto the scene in recent years, with over 1,100 products now available and plenty more on the way. As the popularity of these investment tools has grown, so too has their reach in todays markets. The average investor can now obtain exposure to a number of asset classes that would otherwise not be available using the exchange traded structure. One of the most promising and newest frontiers in the ETF industry is the actively-managed space, a corner of the market that combines the flexibility and efficiency of the exchange-traded structure with the attempt to generate excess returns.
Despite a number of academic studies showing that active management fails to consistently add value, alpha hunting remains one of the great American pastimes. Research shows that managers will fail to beat their benchmark as much as 80% of the time (after considering costs), leading many seeking exposure to very liquid and efficient asset classes to pursue indexing strategies. Yet there are corners of the market where some investors are more comfortable with the idea of having the expertise of an experienced manager. These can include emerging and markets and the high risk / high return world of junk bonds.
The actively-managed world has been slow to gain traction as far as ETFs are concerned, but with more of these products hitting the market, it is clear that there is interest in these funds is still growing. The new Peritus High Yield ETF (HYLD), the result of a partnership between AdvisorShares and Peritus Asset Management, is the first actively-managed ETF to focus on high yield debt, and just the fourth U.S.-listed ETF available in this often intimidating but potentially lucrative segment of the fixed income space. But the lack of an underlying index isnt the only thing that makes HYLD unique; the management team behind this fund has a different approach to investing in high yield corporate debt.
Under The Hood
The fund will be managed by Timothy Gramatovich, who started his career at Drexel Burnham and whose experience working around the bankruptcy arena in the Los Angeles federal courts system helped to shape an innovative investment strategy. Gramatovich manages the Peritus portfolios along with Ronald Heller, a former NFL tight end who started his finance career at Smith Barney and went on to co-found Peritus. Unlike many fixed income managers who use credit ratings as a critical part of their investment philosophy, Peritus gives the scores assigned by S&P and Moodys little to no consideration; it is their view that debt is either AAA or D, meaning that it will either pay out or it wont. HYLD is also designed to be more selective than indexed junk bond funds that hold the entire market. For example, the Peritus team generally stays away from debt issued in connection with the pre-2008 wave of highly leveraged LBOs, which may carry excessive risk in the current environment. The team will also refrain from buying bonds directly from issuers, waiting instead to purchase securities on the secondary market. This strategy could allow the managers to get a better understanding of the markets perception of a bonds worth, allowing shrewd managers to better exploit inefficiencies in the marketplace.
The underlying investment thesis also focuses on the idea of diversification vs. deworsification, meaning that simply diversifying a portfolio is not useful if the correct investments are not chosen. And the flexibility of the fund isnt limited to selecting individual securities or themes within the junk bond space; HYLD maintains the flexibility to shift exposure into Treasuries when spreads narrow and the outlook for the high yield debt space deteriorates. Such a strategy can obviously be valuable if managers are able to identify periods of turbulence for junk bonds, but can backfire if yield is sacrificed (by shifting to safer securities) but junk bonds continue to perform well.
High Yield Space Surging
HYLD will be the latest entry into an asset class that has been among the best performers of the last several year and continues to attract investor interest. With interest rates near record lows and expected to remain depressed for the foreseeable future, many investors have become more creative in their hunt for current returns. For some, that search has led to dividend-paying stocks or MLPs, while others have embraced a larger allocation to junk bonds in teh fixed income portion of their portfolios.
HYLD will feature 40-60 holdings at any given time, and allocations to various sectors will change along with the fund managers views on which corners of the market are most promising. Currently, debt from Opti Canada and Gibson Energy are among the largest holdings, though individual holdings can change frequently [investors can see the complete list of holdings at any time on the AdvisorShares' website]. The target yield for HYLD will be in the 8%-10% range, and many of the current holdings pay coupons of 10% or more.
For investors looking to beef up their exposure to junk bonds but uncertain that simple indexing is the most efficient strategy, HYLD may be worth a closer look. The combination of an experienced management team and the inherent efficiency and liquidity of the exchange-traded structure creates a unique opportunity for investors who subscribe to the Peritus approach to junk bonds. Perhaps the biggest question mark surrounding the new fund is the expense ratio; at 1.35%, HYLD is considerably more expensive than the other options in the Junk Bond ETFdb Category (the average is 0.69%, and JNK charges just 0.4% in total annual fees.
Disclosure: No positions at time of writing.
Disclaimer: ETF Database is not an investment advisor, and any content published by ETF Database does not constitute individual investment advice. The opinions offered herein are not personalized recommendations to buy, sell or hold securities. From time to time, issuers of exchange-traded products mentioned herein may place paid advertisements with ETF Database. All content on ETF Database is produced independently of any advertising relationships.

description.content:
日刊スポーツ12月22日（水）17時35分
トヨタ自動車の新型「ヴィッツ」発表会が２２日、横浜市内で行われ、ＣＭに出演する俳優大沢たかお（４２）と生田斗真（２６）が出席した。
ＣＭで２人が扮（ふん）しているのはナゾの組織に追われている探偵役。そのため走り回る映像が多く、大沢は「普通の映画の３本分くらい走りました」。生田も「走りながらもスタイリッシュな映像にしなくちゃいけないんで大変でした」と撮影を振り返った。
３代目となる新型車両について同社の豊田章男社長は「走りとデザインにこだわったかっこいい車。小さなヴィッツですが、世界中に大きな夢を運んでくれると思います」と自信を見せた。

description.hltext_display: 日本小笠原群島 7.4強震
description.content:
日本南部小笠原群島(Bonin Islands)今天凌晨2時19 分 (台灣時間3時19分)遭芮氏規模7.4的強烈地震襲擊，把居民由睡夢中驚醒。日本氣象廳立刻發布海嘯警告，上百名村民躲到高地過夜；但氣象廳隨後把海嘯警告降級，並在5 小時後取消。
據日本氣象廳公布的資料，這次地震震央位於小笠原群島的父島 (Chichi-shima)東方153公里，深度僅14公里。氣象廳擔心如此強度的地震可能引發2公尺高的海嘯，當地政府立刻開設5處收容所供民眾避難，擴音器警告聲在群島各村落響起。
父島位於東京以南約1000公里處，離太平洋硫磺島很近，島上居民約2300人。包括東京在內的日本東部及東北部地區普遍感到震動，夏威夷太平洋海嘯警報中心警告，這樣規模的地震，有時候會產生地區性海嘯，對距震央100公里內的海岸帶來毀滅性影響。
但40分鐘後，小笠原群島海岸僅出現約30公分高的海浪，氣象廳遂把降級。在主要地震發生20分鐘後，又陸續有8次規模5.3至5.6的餘震，徹夜不絕。
由於未傳出傷亡與財物損失，當地政府已在天亮前關閉收容所，但提醒居民提防餘震。父島旅館業者永井在接受法新社電話訪問表示：「這是我經歷過最強烈的地震，大家都被嚇醒，但旅館建築並未出現裂痕，大家很快恢復平靜。」
日本位處地震帶，全球最強烈的地震有20%出現在日本，1995年規模7.2的神戶地震曾造成6400人喪生。

Đột phá về bộ nhớ Spintronic
description.content:
Xem thêm: mã hóa thông tin, spin, electron, bộ nhớ máy tính, spintronics, dữ liệu
Một nhóm nhà nghiên cứu quốc tế đã tìm ra cách mã hóa thông tin trong spin của electron - kỹ thuật hứa hẹn có thể tạo bộ nhớ nhỏ hơn, nhanh hơn cho các máy tính.
Mặc dù ý tưởng này (được gọi là Spintronics) đã được nghiên cứu tỉ mỉ từ hơn một thập kỷ nay, các nhà nghiên cứu vẫn khẳng định công việc của họ là bước đột phá vì một số lý do.
Đầu tiên, thông tin được mã hóa trong 100 giây, một thời gian trước đây không đạt được trong các nguyên mẫu spintronics. Ngoài ra, phương pháp tiếp cận của họ cho phép dữ liệu được mã hóa trên các nguyên tử phốt pho, giúp dữ liệu dễ dàng được đọc và cập nhật bởi các thiết bị silicon - loại vật liệu được nhiều máy tính ngày nay sử dụng.
Các nhà nghiên cứu - đến từ ĐH Florida (Mỹ), ĐH Utah (Mỹ), ĐH London (Anh) và ĐH Sydney (Úc) - đã công bố phát hiện của họ trên số ra mới nhất của tạp chí Science.
Sử dụng thiết bị trong Phòng thí nghiệm Từ trường cao Quốc gia (NHMFL) của ĐH Florida, các nhà nghiên cứu có thể điều khiển đặc điểm từ tính (hay spin) của các electron và hạt nhân mà chúng quay quanh. Họ sử dụng các trường từ tính mạnh để hướng dẫn spin, nhiệt độ lạnh để chế ngự chuyển động của các nguyên tử.
Nghiên cứu được tài trợ bởi Quỹ Khoa học Quốc gia (NSF) Mỹ, bang Florida, Hội đồng nghiên cứu Úc, Hội đồng Nghiên cứu Khoa học Vật lý và Cơ khí Anh và Ủy ban Hoàng gia cho Triển lãm 1851 của Anh.

description.hltext_display: Nghe chuột ‘hót’ như chim
description.content:
- Các nhà khoa học người Nhật Bản đã tạo ra thành công một loại chuột biến đổi gen có thể phát ra âm thanh như tiếng chim hót.
Một nhóm các nhà khoa học thuộc trường đại học Osaka (Nhật Bản) đã tạo ra những con chuột biến đổi gen có thể ‘hót’ nhưng những con chim. Thành công này có thể giúp các nhà khoa học hiểu rõ hơn về sự ảnh hưởng của gen đối với quá trình phát triển ngôn ngữ của động vật.
Các nhà khoa học đã tiến hành cho lai ghép những con chuột được biến đổi gen. Qua nhiều lần lai ghép sau đó, nhóm nghiên cứu đã bất ngờ tạo ra được một loài chuột mới có khả năng phát ra âm thanh như tiếng chim hót.
Tiến sĩ Arikuni Uchimura, người đứng đầu cuộc nghiên cứu, cho biết: “Chúng tôi vô cùng bất ngờ về kết quả nghiên cứu. Bởi vì mục đích lai ghép ban đầu của chúng tôi là là nhằm tạo ra những loài chuột biến đổi gen có hình dạng khác nhau.”
Các nhà khoa học hy vọng kết quả nghiên cứu sẽ giúp giả mã được quá trình tiến hóa ngôn ngữ ở loài người vì chuột có cấu trúc gen di truyền khá giống với con người.
Video chuột có thể ‘hót’ như chim:
Lê Hương (Theo Daily Mail)

description.hltext_display: 関、仙台からの期限付き移籍延長…横浜Ｃ
歷來最大規模 南韓明實彈演習
description.content:
南韓軍方宣布，明天將在南北韓邊界附近進行歷來規模最大的實彈演習，演習地點在邊界以南20公里的抱川(Pocheon)地區，距首爾不到50公里。
參加演習的包括800名士兵、F-15戰機、直升機、反戰車火箭、多管火箭砲，平時演習只有6門K-9自走砲、這次將增至36門，各種武器都將進行實彈射擊。軍方發言人表示，抱川地區演習過去進行過50餘次，但這次規模空前。
南韓20日在延坪島海域進行實彈演習，北韓事前揚言要反擊，但事後僅表示「不值得」回擊，不尋常的反應反而讓南韓格外憂心，軍隊維持高度警戒，嚴防北韓報復。
今天起，南韓海軍艦隊將在東海展開另一項為期4天的機動演習。
據南韓媒體報導，南韓延坪島砲擊演習前後，北韓在海岸地區增設地對艦、地對空導彈，部分導彈甚至已安裝在發射台。
南韓安保問題研究所理事長金熙相指出，北韓有可能動用特殊戰力對首爾地區主要設施發動恐怖襲擊，這類攻擊會使南韓社會將陷入危機。其他軍事分析家也擔心，北韓可能再次使用類似「天安艦」遭擊沈的手段報復。

description.hltext_display: Retailers tip 'Xmas with techno twist'
description.content:
SHOPPERS are expected to spend more money in Queensland leading up to Christmas than they did last year, but only just, the Australian Retailers Association says.
The peak industry body has projected that for Queensland from the last two weeks of November through to Christmas Eve consumers will spend $8.2 billion of the $39.9 billion it expects to be spent across the country.
But that is not a big increase, up from $8.1 billion over the same period last year.
ARA executive director Russell Zimmerman said retailers were hoping that having five full weekdays of shopping before Christmas would give retailers a slight advantage.
"It is going to be a very ordinary Christmas with a techno twist," Mr Zimmerman said.
He said goods like iPads and iPhones were selling well, but some of the normally popular items at Christmas like small electrical goods and packaged perfumes had already gone on sale because they were not selling well.
Start of sidebar. Skip to end of sidebar.
End of sidebar. Return to start of sidebar.
"Clothes are also doing poorly, mainly because of the weather, with people reluctant to buy when it has been wet and cooler than normal," Mr Zimmerman said.
He said the tourist areas of Queensland like the Gold Coast would also be hit hard because of the drop in the number of visitors spending their money.
Mr Zimmerman said there were a number of reasons for the sluggish pre-Christmas sales.
He said the wet and cooler than normal weather and the Melbourne Cup Day interest rate rise when banks almost doubled the Reserve Bank increase were two of the main ones.
"It was just like someone turned the tap off," Mr Zimmerman said.
He said figures released on Tuesday by Fitch Ratings showed in Queensland there had been a significant increase in the number of people in arrears on their mortgage payments and that also had to be a factor.
The aftermath of the global financial crisis and the big increases in electricity and water bills were also having an impact, Mr Zimmerman said.
However, despite hoping consumers would keep on spending over the final two days before Christmas, Mr Zimmerman also adopted a cautious approach and urged people to "spend wisely".

description.hltext_display: London International Group Global Managing Director Jack Hu Attends 2010 American Music Awards
description.content:
IRVINE, CA London International Group Chairman and Global Managing Director Jack Hu attended the 2010 American Music Awards this past Sunday at the Nokia Theatre in Los Angeles. Jack Hu also attended the AMA Pre-Party at Lucky Strike, along with pop music and Broadway vet Lance Bass, Flipping Out's Jenni Pulos, country pop singer-songwriter Jennette McCurdy, Jackass 3D's Steve-O, Blind Side's Quinton Aaron and Twilight's Michael Welch. The guests participated in a bowl tournament to raise awareness for important charitable organizations, including The Trevor Project, TJ Martell Foundation, PETA, Thirst Project, and the Little Nugget Foundation.
"Rihanna kicked the show off on the perfect high-impact, intense note with 'I Love the Way You Lie' and 'The Only Girl in the World' and I also enjoyed the performances of Usher, Jon Bon Jovi, Taylor Swift and Katy Perry," said Jack Hu, "Justin Beiber's new song is sure to top the charts. It's always great to watch someone new erupt into a world-wide sensation. You never know who or what will be the next big thing and that's what keeps the industry so exciting."
London International Group is a global consulting firm providing executive-level advisory services through its five groups -- Engineering, Global, Investments, Communications, and Consumer, to fast-growing and established companies in areas including aerospace and defense, automotive, consumer products, energy and environment, financial services, global advantage and international affairs, insurance, media and entertainment, nonprofit, real estate, retail, technology, telecommunications, tourism, and transportation.
London International Group's Communications group uses the latest technological advances to maximize the opportunities for artist exposure, promotion of material, and personal response to fans. The Communications group specializes in talent representation by creating outlets for artists in the worldwide media marketplace and distributing music through strategic alliances with major record label companies, as well as domestic and foreign music vendors. The Communications group works on live entertainment production, merchandising, image management, and multi-channel advertising campaigns based on the client's brand, target audience, budget, competitors, and long-term goals. Additional information about London International Group is available at: www.londoninternationalgroup.com .

description.hltext_display: Khám phá ếch ma c� rồng ở Việt Nam
description.content:
Khám phá ếch ma cà rồng ở Việt Nam
Ếch cây ma cà rồng mới được khám phá. Ảnh: Zootaxa
SGTT.VN - Tiến sĩ Jodi J.L. Rowley, bảo tàng nước Úc cùng nhóm nghiên cứu Lê Thị Thuỳ Dương, Trần Thị Anh Đào, tiến sĩ Hoàng Đức Huy, khoa sinh học (đại học Khoa học tự nhiên TP.HCM), tiến sĩ Bryan L. Stuart, bảo tàng Khoa học tự nhiên Bắc Carolina (Mỹ) vừa công bố loài ếch cây đặc hữu mới ở tạp chí động vật học Zootaxa số ra ngày 21.12.2010.
Loài ếch này có tên khoa học Rhacophorus vampyrus sp. nov. Rowley, Lê, Trần, Stuart & Hoàng, 2010. Ngoài một số khác biệt về màu sắc, màng bơi giữa các ngón chi trước tiêu giảm, khớp xương chày nhọn nhô ra. Chiều dài đầu thân 38,9 – 53,4mm. Loài ếch cây mới này chỉ phân bố ở vườn quốc gia Bi Đoup – Núi Bà thuộc cao nguyên Lang Bian (tỉnh Lâm Đồng). Các tác giả tiên đoán phân bố của loài ếch mới này có thể mở rộng đến khu vực vườn quốc gia Phước Bình (Ninh Thuận), vườn quốc gia Chư Yang Sin ( Dăk Lăk). Loài ếch cây này được ghi nhận như là loài thiếu dữ liệu (DD) trong Sách đỏ thế giới.

description.hltext_display: (Goal.com Özel) Serie A'nın en kötü 11'i
description.content:
Kaleci Eduardo (Genoa) Castrol Ranking: 930 2009-2010 dneminde Serie A'nın en kt savunmasını sergileyen Genoa, gol yeme sorununu zmek iin yaz aylarında kolları sıvayıp defans hattını glendirmişti. İtalyan ekibi bu blgedeki sıkıntılarını byk lde gidermiş gibi grnse de, Portekizli kalecileri Eduardo, kimi zaman yaptığı akıl almaz hatalarla takımını zmeyi srdrd. Defence
Sokratis Papastathopoulos (Milan) Castrol Ranking: 1043 Milan 17 ma boyunca sadece 3 kez yenilerek lige harika bir başlangı yaptı. Ancak bu mağlubiyetin ikisinde Papastathopoulos'un takımdaki yerini almış olması tesadf değil. Genoa'dan bu yaz transfer edilirken bile Milan kalitesinde bir oyuncu olmadığı belliydi aslında. Milan'ın, oyuncuyla imzaladığı 5 yıllık kontratın bitmesini beklemeden Papastathopoulos'u gndereceği tahmin ediliyor.
Miguel Angel Britos (Bologna) Castrol Ranking: 853 Uruguaylı oyuncu daha yılbaşı olmadan, kendi gol rekorunu kırmayı başardı. Ancak kendi mevkisi olan savunmayı unutmuşa benziyor. Bologna da bunu pahalıya dyor. Palermo, Napoli ve Milan gibi takımlara karşı aldıkları yenilgilerde hep onun imzası var.
Marco Materazzi (Inter) Castrol Ranking: 1141 Bu sezon sadece 159 dakika boyunca forma giymiş olabilir, ama bu sre bile Matrixin kendini gstermesine yetiyor. Milan derbisindeki drt dakikalık oyunuyla Zlatan Ibrahimovic'e hediye ettiği penaltı bunun iin kusursuz bir rnek. Materazzi, son yıllarda Inter defansının grdğ en kt performanslardan birini sergiliyor adeta.
Luca Antonini (Milan) Castrol Ranking: 332 Nasıl olur da devreyi lider kapatan ekibin ortalama bir defans oyuncusu, devrenin en kt 11'inde yer almayı başarır? nk Antonioni o denli yavaş ki, Almanya'daki otobanların hızlı şeridinde bekleyen bir yayaya benziyor! Her oynayışında, rakip takımın Milan kalesinde tehlike yaratmasına vesile olmayı başaran savunmacı, Romanın cumartesi gn Milan'ı alt etmesinde de nemli bir grev stlenerek, takımına bir yılbaşı hediyesi vermiş oldu.
Orta saha
Davide Lanzafame (Juventus) Castrol Ranking: 1468 Bu, kanat oyuncusunun ıkışa geeceği yıl olmalıydı. Kiralık anlaşmalarıyla bugne dek Avrupa'nın en byk iki liginde top koşturma şansına erişen oyucunun, Juventus'a dnmesiyle birlikte byk başarılara imza atacağına inanılmıştı. Ancak UEFA Avrupa Ligi n elemelerindeki birka parıltı dışında, kayda değer hibir varlık gsteremedi ve bu yzden de ilk devre boyunca yalnızca ve yalnızca 25 dakika forma bulabildi. Ocak ayında yeniden bir takıma kiralanması gndemde. Gokhan Inler (Udinese) Castrol Ranking: 687 İki yıl nce, Gokhan Inler Avrupa'da en ok peşinden koşulan orta saha oyuncularından biriydi. Bugnse, gemiş yıllarındaki halinden eser yok. Udinese'de Antonio Di Natale ve Alexis Sanchez'in arkasında oynayıp istenen performansı bir trl gsteremeyen İnler'in geleceğinde hala umut ışığı var ve ileride neye dnşeceğine kendisi karar verecek. Ancak ne yazık ki son dnemde hibir gelişim gsteremeyerek "24 yaşındaki potansiyel yıldız" imajından, "27 yaşındaki harcanmış yetenek" imajına doğru yol almayı srdryor. Alessandro Gazzi (Bari) Castrol Ranking: 798 Siması İngiltere'nin "Kızıl Dahisi" Paul Scholes' andırsa da, Alessandro Gazzi'de Scholes'n yeteneğinin ancak yzde ellisi mevcut. Bari'de isteneni bir trl veremeyen Gazzi, sahada etkili olmayı bir trl başaramıyor. Bari iki yıl aradan sonra tekrar Serie B'ye dnecekse, Gazzi ve arkadaşlarının nerede hata yaptıklarını dşnmeleri gerek. Atak
Maxi Lopez (Catania) Castrol Ranking: 372 Catania'nın, Gremio'da top koştururken olduka başarılı bir performans sergileyen Lopez'i transfer etmesi, ok doğru bir hamle gibi gzkyordu. 17 mata 11 gol atmış bir oyuncu iin kim başka trl dşnebilirdi ki? Ancak Arjantinli, bu yıl oynadığı 15 mata fileleri yalnızca 3 kez havalandırarak, gemiş gnleri mumla aratmayı başardı.
Diego Milito (Inter)- Castrol Ranking: 248 Hibir yıldız bu denli kısa srede snmş myd? Inter'in geen yıl elde ettiği zaferlerde hep onun imzası vardı. Serie A, İtalya Kupası ve Şampiyonlar Ligi kupalarını kaldırırken hep Milito'nun ismi haykırılıyordu. Dnyanın en iyi oyuncuları arasına sokulan Milito, Rafa Benitez'in takıma gelmesiyle birlikte yle byk bir dşş gsterdi ki, tm futbolseverler hayrete dşt. Ligde şu ana dek gol atabildiği iki takım var. Biri Serie A'da 19. sırada, tekisiyse 20. Eder (Brescia) Castrol Ranking: 1313 2009-2010 dneminde Empoli'de attığı 27 golle dikkatleri zerine eken Eder, Milan'ın transfer listesine bile girmişti. Brescia'ya transfer olan Brezilyalı, bu sene bambaşka bir performans izdi ve bırakın beklenen oyununu sergilemeyi, Serie A'da sadece 1 gol atarak hem yeni takımı, hem de İtalyan futbolseverlere byk bir şaşkınlık yaratmayı başardı.
Eduardo Papastathopoulos Britos Materazzi Antonini Lanzafame Inler Gazzi Lopez Milito Eder

description.hltext_display: Parents most influence teens' decisions about sex
description.author: Editors
description.content:
New Survey: Teens Say Parents Most Influence Their Decisions About Sex
Survey Also Reveals One-Third of Teens Believe Birth Control Doesn't Work
The teen birth rate in the United States declined 6% in 2009 and is now at a record low, according to new data released today by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's National Center for Health Statistics. Rates declined among older and younger teens and among all racial and ethnic groups. For example, the birth rate among Hispanic teens declined 10% in 2009 and is now at a record low. "Good news just in time for the holidays – a steep decline in teen births," said Sarah Brown, CEO of The National Campaign to Prevent Teen and Unplanned Pregnancy. "It is now apparent that the increase in the teen birth rate noted in 2007 and 2008 was only a hiccup – a blip – in the longer term, two-decade decline in teen births. We now are, thankfully, back on track. The credit and praise goes to teens themselves for making better decisions about their lives today and their plans for the future." Brown continued, "Still, the Grinch among us recognizes that what goes down can go back up again. Even when the news is good, it is essential that parents, practitioners, policymakers, and really anyone who cares about teenagers remember that the U.S. still has the highest rates of teen pregnancy and births among comparable countries and that we all need to continue helping teens postpone their families until they are older, through school, and in stable, committed relationships." A new public opinion survey released today by The National Campaign to Prevent Teen and Unplanned Pregnancy provides some important context for the new birth data. Two of the toplines from With One Voice 2010, a nationally representative telephone survey of 1,008 young people (aged 12-19) and 1,000 adults (age 20 and older), are:

description.hltext_display: Warriors erase deficit, top Kings in OT
description.content:
Golden State overcame a 16-point fourth quarter deficit and Monta Ellis scored nine points in overtime, as the Warriors topped the Sacramento Kings, 117-109, at ARCO Arena.
Ellis scored a game-high 36 and Reggie Williams added 24 points for the Warriors, who got 15 points and 12 rebounds from David Lee.
Vladimir Radmanovic finished with 15 points off the bench -- including a game- tying three at the end of regulation -- for Golden State, which halted a two-game skid. Dorell Wright supplied 17 points, six rebounds and six assists in the win.
Beno Udrih led the Kings with a career-high 34 points and Tyreke Evans finished with 15 to go with 10 rebounds and seven assists for Sacramento, which has lost 14-of-15.
Carl Landry finished with 22 points and 10 rebounds in the loss.
"There's a line in this league when you think you can't get any lower, it gets lower," Kings head coach Paul Westphal said.
A Landry layup with 9:20 left in regulation gave the Kings a 94-78 lead. However, Radmanovic connected on a deep three at the other end to start an 18-4 Warriors run that stretched into the final seconds of play.
Ellis' short layup with 8:22 had Golden State within 94-83, and after Lee added two from the line, Wright and Ellis both connected on layups.
Evans made a layup of his own at the 4:21 mark to temporarily halt the Warriors' surge, making it a 96-89 game, but after the teams traded baskets, Ellis' bucket trimmed the deficit to five. Williams then made three of four from the charity stripe to cap the Sacramento run with 15.1 on the clock.
The Kings were up four, 102-98, after Udrih made two from the line with 8.1 seconds left, but a Williams free throw with 3.4 ticks remaining cut the margin to three. Williams missed his second try, but Golden State got the rebound, and Radmanovic's triple as time expired sent the game into overtime tied at 102.
Lee's three-point play with 1:25 left in overtime gave Golden State a 111-109 lead. After a Sacramento turnover, Ellis made two from the line. He scored the game's final six points in all -- four free throws and a layup -- as the Kings missed their final four shots down the stretch.
"I think our guys held true and we were able to make a lot of plays, defensive stops," Warriors head coach Keith Smart said. "That is what I am trying to get them to understand. They are good offensive players, but if they can get it into their hearts how hard it is to be a good defensive team, rebounding and making stops when they are necessary, then you are going to have a chance to have fun down the road."
Udrih scored 12 of the Kings' 18 first-quarter points, but the Warriors shot 64.7 percent from the field, en route to a 26-18 lead. Landry scored 13 in the second quarter as the Kings cut the Golden State lead to one, 49-48, at the intermission.
The Warriors' lead was as high as six in the opening minutes of the third, but after a Landry free throw about midway through tied the game at 61 and keyed a 12-2 run.
Udrih's pullup jumper with 3:37 left ended the spurt and put the Kings up 72-63. Francisco Garcia added a three and a layup in the final 31 seconds to put Sacramento up 84-70 heading to the fourth.
Game Notes
Landry's 22 points tied a season-high...Donte Greene scored 10 points and Cousins grabbed 13 rebounds with seven points in the loss...Sacramento won the rebounding margin 56-48...The Warriors converted on 11-of-12 fast break opportunities for 31 points.

description.hltext_display: レンタル中の斎藤陽、シンガポール移籍…横浜Ｍ
Chesapeake in the Crosshairs
description.author: Toby Shute
description.content:
Just last week, I was detailing Carl Icahn's canny move on Dynegy (NYSE: DYN). On Friday, we learned about Carl's next potential target. In a "13D" filing -- signifying an active shareholder stake -- Icahn disclosed a 5.8% stake in natural gas producer Chesapeake Energy (NYSE: CHK), with a recent flurry of buying in the $22.72 to $22.89 range. Here's the disclosure from the section entitled Purpose of Transaction: "The Reporting Persons acquired the Shares in the belief that the Shares were undervalued. The Reporting Persons have had and intend to seek to continue to have conversations with the Issuer's management to discuss the business and operations of the Issuer and the maximization of shareholder value." Other than the increase in his stake, none of this is really news. Back in August, Bloomberg quoted Chesapeake CEO Aubrey McClendon as saying that Icahn "told us he thought we had great assets, great management and were undervalued." In response to this filing, investors have bid the stock up above $25 per share. Basically, folks are speculating that now that Icahn has amassed a considerable stake, he'll start pushing for some sort of value-unlocking event. That's not a terrible assumption, given his track record with past targets like Motorola (MOT) and Yahoo! (YHOO). That, and the fact that he's accumulated a portion of his stake using margin borrowing.
Funny. You'd think that after McClendon's experience with buying Chesapeake shares on margin, others might refrain from the risky strategy. Then again, Chesapeake trades at less than half of its mid-2008 highs, and the shares are almost certainly a better value today.
Anyway, it seems pretty likely that Icahn will be looking for some sort of change at Chesapeake, though I have no idea what form that might take. If he is indeed happy with management, then it's hard to see what ideas he might have that Chesapeake itself hasn't already come up with. Between the company's volumetric production payment deals, joint venture transactions, and midstream IPO, you can hardly accuse Chesapeake of inaction on the financial tinkering front.
A management-led buyout, akin to what's been proposed at EXCO Resources (NYSE: XCO), seems far-fetched. In case you haven't noticed, the private equity industry has dialed way back on the size of its targets since the financial crisis. According to peHUB, the biggest deal of 2010 was the proposed buyout of Del Monte Foods (NYSE: DLM) for $5.3 billion. Chesapeake's enterprise value is over five times in size.
If Icahn thinks that company should be broken up or sold to a major like Chevron (NYSE: CVX), well, I don't expect management to be receptive. At all. This is co-founder McClendon's vehicle, and I don't expect him to hand over the keys without a fight. If this is the avenue Icahn pursues, expect big-time fireworks.
Disclosure: No positions

description.hltext_display: New Zealand tiết lộ t� i liệu của chính phủ về UFO
description.content:
Các tài liệu được công bố có từ năm 1945-2009, gồm cả hình vẽ về những vật thể bay và các mẫu được cho là chữ viết của người ngoài hành tinh.
Các tài liệu còn tiết lộ thông tin chi tiết về vụ xuất hiện UFO nổi tiếng ở nước này vào năm 1978, khi những ánh sáng lạ được thấy ở ngoài khơi thị trấn Kaikoura, trên đảo South Island.
Một thông báo chính thức vào thời gian đó cho rằng ánh sáng lạ trên chỉ là hiện tượng tự nhiên.
Mặc dù vụ việc thu hút được sự quan tâm lớn của báo chí quốc tế vào thời điểm đó, song báo cáo của quân đội lại cho rằng đó là ánh sáng từ các con tàu phản chiếu trong các đám mây hoặc hình ảnh bất thường về sao Kim.
Sau khi công bố các tài liệu, người phát ngôn của Không quân New Zealand cho hay quân đội không có nguồn lực để điều tra các vụ xuất hiện của UFO đó và không thể bình luận gì về nội dung của các tài liệu.
“Chúng tôi chỉ thu thập thông tin. Chúng tôi không điều tra và không đưa ra báo cáo và chúng tôi không chứng minh bất kỳ điều gì”, ông cho biết trên tờ Dominion Post.
Các tài liệu được công bố theo luật tự do thông tin sau khi giới chức trách đã xóa bỏ tên và các vật được xác định khác.
Tài liệu được công bố gồm khoảng 2.000 trang, tập hợp báo cáo từ công chúng, nhân viên quân sự, phi công dân sự, mô tả những vụ chạm trán với UFO, mà hầu hết đều miêu tả có ánh sáng chuyển động trên bầu trời.
Tất cả các tài liệu gốc hiện đang được bảo mật tại kho lưu trữ quốc gia.

description.hltext_display: Zhang says Bale to start in Nanjing film
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content: Christian Bale's work in "The Fighter" as the drug-using, ex-boxer Dicky Eklund's is the latest example of how the actor transforms himself for a role. It can be as subtle as the deep-throated growls of Batman in "The Dark Knight" or as obvious as the massive amount of weight he lost for "The Machinist."...

description.hltext_display: Galatasaray Culio'ya talip
description.content:
Share Share Fotoğraf Galerisi Fotoğrafı büyüt Şampiyonlar Ligi: (CFR Cluj) İlgili Linkler Takımlar CFR Cluj Galatasaray Kişiler Rumen kulb CFR Cluj'un sahibi Arpad Paskany, Galatasaray'ın, Arjantinli sol kanat oyuncuları iin resmi teklifte bulunduğunu aıklayarak gndeme oturdu. Fanatik'in haberine gre ara transfer dnemi iin ok sıkı alışan Galatasaray, Emmanuel Culio iin kulb Cluj'e yazılı bir teklifte bulundu. Bu oyuncu iin Cluj'a 1.5 milyon avro neren Galatasaray, Rumen ekibinin 2 milyon avroluk isteğini aşağıya ekmeye alışıyor. İspanyadan Espanyol, Rusyadan ise Rubin Kazan ve Kuban takımları, Culioya talipti. Arjantinli futbolcu, 2008-09da Şampiyonlar Liginde Roma deplasmanında 2 gol atıp dikkatleri zerine ekmişti. Galatasaray, sezon başında Clujun kaptanı Caduyla da ilgilenmişti.
27 yaşındaki oyuncu 2007 yılında La Serena'dan transfer olduğu Cluj'da 107 mata forma giydi.

description.hltext_display: FDA urged to revisit mercury in fillings; here's a Q&A:
description.content:
WASHINGTON - For more than two decades, the Food and Drug Administration, under pressure from consumer activists and some medical experts, has wrestled with how to regulate dental fillings containing mercury.
Last week, just 18 months after the FDA declared such fillings safe, an advisory committee of outside experts recommended that the agency revisit the question.
Question: Why is mercury even in fillings?
Answer: Mercury, which is liquid at room temperature, binds amalgam alloy - silver, tin, copper and sometimes zinc - into a mass that is malleable enough for the dentist to work it into a cavity but then hardens to make a durable filling. The American Dental Association and other supporters of amalgam say that in binding with other metals mercury is rendered stable and safe.
Q: Why is it controversial?
A: Mercury is a well-known toxin in sufficiently large doses, such as those received when eating large amounts of mercury-contaminated fish. But information about the health effects of mercury vapor arising from amalgam is much sketchier.
The FDA's current guidance, released in July 2009, is that the fillings are safe for people 6 and older, but it notes that very young children and developing fetuses may be more sensitive to mercury vapor from amalgam.
Opponents of amalgam fillings say that the FDA has misread scientific evidence that points to harm.
Q: What are some of the challenges in sorting this out?
A: There's a dearth of human studies showing how much mercury vapor it takes to trigger toxic effects such as brain and kidney disorders.
In addition, the amount of mercury vapor produced by fillings and absorbed by individuals can vary depending on genetics, the number of fillings and their surface area, and factors such as grinding teeth and chewing gum.
Q: Are there alternatives to amalgam?
A: Yes. Amalgam use has been decreasing, in part out of concern about the mercury content and in part because of a consumer preference for other kinds of fillings, including ones made from composite resin, which can be matched to tooth color.
But amalgam fillings, which are silver-colored, still are the cheapest and longest-lasting patches for tooth decay.
Q: What are the issues beyond public health?
A: Tens of millions of people have amalgam fillings, and an FDA determination that they cause harm would raise questions about whether they should be removed and who should pay for it.
In addition, a finding that amalgam is harmful could set in motion a barrage of litigation against dentists, amalgam manufacturers and the ADA.
Q: What recommendations did the advisory committee make?
A: First, the FDA should consider requiring dentists to tell patients what is known and not known about mercury exposure through amalgam, so that patients can give informed consent.
Second, the agency should attempt to identify a safe dose of mercury from fillings by reviewing existing studies of amalgam and research on mercury vapor exposure.

description.hltext_display: Việt Nam hướng tới l� m khảo cổ học vì lợi ích cộng đồng
description.content:
Việt Nam có thể làm khảo cổ học cộng đồng là khẳng định của các nhà khoa học, nhà khảo cổ học Việt Nam và thế giới tại Hội thảo khoa học quốc tế mang tên "Khảo cổ học vì lợi ích cộng đồng - Sự chia sẻ kinh nghiệm giữa các quốc gia" tổ chức tại thành phố Thanh Hóa trong 2 ngày 20-21/12. Đây là Hội thảo về khảo cổ học cộng đồng lần đầu tiên được tổ chức tại Việt Nam.
Các báo cáo, tham luận của các nhà khoa học trong nước và quốc tế, cũng như ý kiến của các nhà quản lý văn hóa, chính quyền cơ sở tại Hội thảo đều tập trung bàn đến cách thức để thực hiện Khảo cổ học cộng đồng, hướng tới việc mang đến lợi ích trước hết cho những người dân đang sinh sống tại nơi có di tích, từ đó mở rộng phạm vi ảnh hưởng, liên kết người dân, động viên người dân cùng tham gia vào công tác bảo vệ và phát huy giá trị của di tích. Theo các nhà khoa học, muốn hoạt động Khảo cổ học cộng đồng, bắt buộc phải có sự cam kết gắn bó lâu dài và kết hợp hài hoà giữa nhà khảo cổ, chính quyền, nhà quản lý văn hoá và người dân. Hơn thế, cần có sự đào tạo, hướng dẫn cụ thể để người dân cũng như đội ngũ cán bộ về việc bảo vệ các di tích. Vì trên thực tế ở Việt Nam nói riêng, các di tích khảo cổ học thường nằm ở các địa bàn dân cư sinh sống và phần lớn các di tích đều được chính người dân "vô tình" phát hiện.
Các nhà khoa học đến từ các quốc gia Nhật Bản, Trung Quốc, Thái Lan, Lào, Campuchia, Mỹ, Italia... đã có những chia sẻ hết sức thú vị về khảo cổ học Cộng đồng và kinh nghiệm làm khảo cổ học cộng đồng ở chính đất nước họ. Phần lớn các nhà khoa học đều cho rằng, việc bảo tồn một di chỉ khảo cổ học là hết sức cần thiết. Muốn làm được điều này, trước hết phải dựa vào chính người dân địa phương, bằng cách tuyên truyền, hướng dẫn đội ngũ cán bộ cũng như người dân địa phương để họ hiểu rõ về giá trị, cũng như sự hấp dẫn của di tích mà mình đang có, từ đó, họ sẽ là người bảo vệ chính các di tích đó. Việc này đã được chứng minh tại Di chỉ Ban Pong Manao (Thái Lan), Di chỉ Tắng Bình Nham (Quế Lâm - Trung Quốc) với sự vào cuộc của người dân trong việc bảo tồn và phát huy giá trị của di sản.
Đặc biệt, Khảo cổ học cộng đồng là một lĩnh vực quan trọng trong Khảo cổ học nói chung, đây là vấn đề mới, nhưng là xu hướng phát triển tất yếu của tất cả các quốc gia trên thế giới. Khảo cổ học cộng đồng chính là khảo cổ học của mọi người, dành cho mọi người dân. Tham gia khảo cổ học cộng đồng, người dân được tiếp cận sâu rộng hơn với tri thức khảo cổ và được khuyến khích để tham gia vào việc nghiên cứu, bảo tồn khảo cổ học và phát huy giá trị khảo cổ tại địa phương họ sinh sống. Tại nhiều quốc gia trên thế giới như: Thái Lan, Campuchia, Trung Quốc, khảo cổ học cộng đồng rất phát triển và đạt được những kết quả đáng kể khi người dân tham gia và bảo tồn di sản quá khứ.
Ngoài ra, vấn đề quan trọng mà hội thảo bàn đến đó là tương lai của Khảo cổ học cộng đồng ở Việt Nam và trách nhiệm của cộng đồng khoa học, các cơ quan quản lý và cộng đồng dân cư. Theo Tiến sĩ Nguyễn Giang Hải, Tổng Thư ký Hội Khảo cổ học Việt Nam, từ những thành công cũng như bài học kinh nghiệm của các quốc gia trên thế giới thì việc làm Khảo cổ học cộng đồng đối với Việt Nam là vấn đề không quá khó, không tốn quá nhiều tiền, có thể lồng ghép vào các dự án hoặc các hoạt động khảo cổ học. Là quốc gia có nhiều tiềm năng về Khảo cổ học, với sự đa dạng, phong phú về các di tích, di chỉ khảo cổ, Việt Nam hoàn toàn có thể làm Khảo cổ học cộng đồng. Ông Hải khẳng định, ở bất cứ địa phương nào trên đất nước Việt Nam đều có những người dân thực sự tâm huyết với lịch sử quê hương, bằng nhiều cách khác nhau, họ tìm cách thu thập, giữ gìn chứng cứ và sẵn sàng trợ giúp các nhà khảo cổ. Hơn thế, chúng ta có một hệ thống chân rết những người làm văn hóa tại địa phương có thể giúp các nhà khảo cổ nghiên cứu về các di tích. Hội thảo cũng là cơ hội để các nhà khoa học, các nhà quản lý ở Việt Nam trao đổi học thuật, thu nhận kinh nghiệm của các quốc gia trên thế giới về lĩnh vực Khảo cổ học cộng đồng.
Sau Hội thảo "Khảo cổ học vì lợi ích cộng đồng - Sự chia sẻ kinh nghiệm giữa các quốc gia", chắc chắn các nhà khoa học, các nhà quản lý sẽ có nhiều hoạt động tích cực khác để Khảo cổ học cộng đồng được thực hiện một cách hiệu quả và bền vững ở Việt Nam trong tương lai không xa./.

description.hltext_display: "Huntelaar Schalke'de mutlu"
description.content:
Schalke 04'n Hollandalı yıldızı Klaas-Jan Huntelaar'ın menajeri, oyuncu hakkında Juventus'a gideceği ynnde ıkan haberleri yalanlayarak, Huntelaar'ın Almanya'da ok mutlu olduğunu syledi. Huntelaar'ın menajerliğini yapan Arnold Oosterveer, Calciomercatoweb.it'e yaptığı aıklamada, "Huntelaar'ın Juventus'a gideceği ynndeki haberleri gazetelerin uydurmasıdır. Benim ve oyuncunun kimseyle bir grşmesi olmadı" ifadelerini kullandı.
Milan'dan Schalke'ye 14 milyon avroya transfer olan Huntelaar'ın Schalke'de gollerine devam edeceğine inandığını syleyen Ossterveer, Schalke Teknik Direktr Felix Magaht'ın Hollandalı oyuncudan ok memnun olduğunu da szlerine ekledi. 15 Bundesliga maında 7 gol kaydeden Huntelaar, Şampiyonlar Ligi'nde de 3 goln altına imzasını koydu.

description.hltext_display: Hải Phòng: Phục hồi rừng thứ sinh nghèo trên núi đá vôi tại vùng đệm Vườn Quốc gia Cát B�
description.content:
Hải Phòng: Phục hồi rừng thứ sinh nghèo trên núi đá vôi tại vùng đệm Vườn Quốc gia Cát Bà
(Tin ngày 22-12-2010)
Vừa qua, Sở KH&CN Hải Phòng đã tổ chức Hội nghị đánh giá đề tài “Nghiên cứu các giải pháp phục hồi rừng thứ sinh nghèo trên núi đá vôi tại vùng đệm Vườn Quốc gia Cát Bà” do nhóm nghiên cứu thuộc Vườn Quốc gia Cát Bà thực hiện từ năm 2007 đến 2010.
Trên cơ sở phân tích chi tiết các đặc điểm về địa hình, thổ nhưỡng, cấu trúc các tầng rừng, tái sinh rừng..., nhóm nghiên cứu đã thực nghiệm xây dựng mô hình khoanh nuôi phục hồi rừng tại vùng đệm Vườn Quốc gia Cát Bà trên tổng diện tích 15 ha: Khoanh nuôi bảo vệ 10 ha, khoanh nuôi xúc tiến tái sinh 2 ha, làm giàu rừng 1,5 ha, nuôi dưỡng rừng 1,5 ha.
Dựa trên kết quả thực nghiệm, nhóm nghiên cứu đã đề xuất 3 nhóm giải pháp phục hồi rừng thứ sinh nghèo trên núi đá vôi. Trước hết, cần phân chia đối tượng tác động cho rừng thứ sinh nghèo. Cơ sở phân chia dựa vào sự phân hóa 3 nhân tố là địa hình, thổ nhưỡng, thảm thực vật rừng. Sau đó, nhóm nghiên cứu chọn được 3 nhóm loài cây có triển vọng để phát triển rừng thứ sinh nghèo trên núi đá vôi: Nhóm loài cây cải tạo hoàn cảnh rừng (cây keo lai), nhóm loài cây gỗ bản địa mục đích (Lim xanh, Trám trắng, Re hướp, Quất hồng bì, Sấu, Giổi xanh); nhóm loài cây cho lâm sản ngoài gỗ (Song mật, Mây nếp).
Nhóm giải pháp kỹ thuật gồm 5 giải pháp chính: Khoanh nuôi bảo vệ, khoanh nuôi xúc tiến tái sinh kết hợp với trồng bổ sung, làm giàu rừng, nuôi dưỡng rừng, cải tạo rừng.
Hân Minh
(Sở KH&CN Hải Phòng)

description.hltext_display: 石井義、３度目でサイン現状維持５５００万円…西武
Đ� i quan sát hạt neutrino lớn nhất thế giới
description.content:
Đài quan sát hạt neutrino lớn nhất thế giới
TTO - Đài quan sát này có tên IceCube, được xây từ một khối băng khổng lồ ở cực nam của Nam cực, nhằm phát hiện các hạt neutrino - một loại hạt được cho là thần bí trong vũ trụ và có tốc độ gần bằng vận tốc ánh sáng.
Live Science dẫn lời các nhà nghiên cứu cho biết việc xây dựng IceCube đã hoàn tất vào ngày 18-12 vừa qua. Trên thực tế nó đã bắt đầu thu thập dữ liệu về hạt neutrino trong nhiều năm qua.
Neutrino là các hạt dưới nguyên tử có tốc độ gần bằng vận tốc ánh sáng. Một số hạt neutrino xuất phát từ Mặt trời, trong khi số khác đến từ các tia vũ trụ tương tác với bầu khí quyển Trái đất và những nguồn khác như các vụ nổ ngôi sao trong dải ngân hà và các thiên hà ở xa.
Các hạt này rất khó theo dõi, vì vậy các nhà khoa học đã dùng băng với hi vọng “bắt” được các hạt neutrino khi chúng đâm vào một trong các nguyên tử hình thành các phân tử băng.
Các nhà khoa học cho biết việc quan sát và nắm bắt được hạt neutrino có ý nghĩa quan trọng, có thể giúp vén bức màn bí ẩn về các tia trong vũ trụ, cho phép con người hiểu biết nhiều hơn về dải ngân hà…

description.hltext_display: Charge over rifle in pub car park brawl
description.content:
A MAN has been charged after a fight in a Queensland car park during which a gunshot was heard.
Police said a 69-year-old Dalby man was approached in a tavern car park at Murphys Creek, Toowoomba about 8pm (AEST) on Tuesday by a group of men with whom he'd earlier argued.
They said it's alleged a rifle was fired during the melee, but no one was hurt.
The man was knocked to the ground, punched and kicked in the back.
Officers called to the scene confiscated a rifle.
The 69-year-old man was taken to Toowoomba Base Hospital for treatment.
Today, he was charged with one count each of carrying a weapon in a public place capable of being discharged and failing to secure a weapon.
He is due to face Toowoomba Magistrates Court on January 18.
Start of sidebar. Skip to end of sidebar.
End of sidebar. Return to start of sidebar.
Police said investigations were continuing.

description.hltext_display: The Battle Over McGill's MBA Tuition Rate
Utility Prepay Offering Continues To Ripen According To DEFG Industry Survey
description.content:
Findings from the survey include:
A majority of the respondents claim to be very knowledgeable about prepaid products.
83 percent of the industry respondents have used some form of prepaid products in the past.
Respondents who have used prepaid products indicated high levels of satisfaction.
When asked if they personally would be interested in a prepaid option offered by their local electric or natural gas utility, a majority (53 percent) indicated that they were not at all interested. Approximately 20 percent of industry respondents indicated a higher level of interest (responding either interested, very interested, or extremely interested.)
Industry respondents estimated that approximately 10 percent of a utilitys customer base (the median of all the responses) would choose a voluntary prepay option.
With a quarter of the responses (25 percent), the top benefit cited by respondents for consumers to use prepay was consumers may receive a discount if they pay in advance. Other leading benefits cited by respondents include: consumer dont want to pay a security deposit and/or avoid other fees associated with traditional service (17 percent) and consumers prefer increased control over energy costs and budget (14 percent).
The industry driver for utility prepay offerings most often cited was actually other, with a quarter of the respondents (25 percent) providing open responses. Most of the open responses emphasized the benefits of prepay to revenue (collections, cash flow, etc.) and risk management (bad debt management, credit risk, etc.) at the utility. 17 percent of the respondents pointed to smart grid deployment as the key driver in the industry. Another 16 percent cited economic realities driven by the recession have created a real consumer need/ preference.
Over half of the respondents (54 percent) expressed interest in the idea that prepay could lead to lower energy consumption through consumer awareness of consumption and cost on a real-time basis. About 10 percent of the respondents were very skeptical of this idea.
There was approximately an even split between the respondents on their concern (49 percent concerned, 41 percent not concerned) about regulatory challenges or rule changes to permit utilities to offer prepay.
The survey confirms that prepay is mainstream and some segment of consumers, including 20 percent of the respondents, will really like that option if offered by their local utility, stated Jamie Wimberly, CEO of DEFG LLC. Prepay may not suit every customer - and thats OK. The real challenges will be regulatory since prepay touches on most of the hot button consumer protection questions.
DEFG is making the survey report available at no charge on our website: www.defgllc.com .
DEFG LLC ( www.defgllc.com ) is a management consulting firm focused on the consumer and the delivery of innovative energy technologies, clean tech solutions and new services by utilities, retail energy suppliers, and energy solution providers.

event_or_fact.property: The survey confirms that prepay is mainstream and some segment of consumers, including 20 percent of the respondents, will really like that option if offered by their local utility

description.hltext_display: Doanh nhân, công chức nhậu thú rừng nhiều nhất
description.content:
Hiện có khoảng 80 loài động vật quý hiếm đang được kinh doanh sử dụng. Đáng lưu ý, các doanh nhân và công chức nhà nước có tỷ lệ sử dụng sản phẩm từ động vật hoang dã (ĐVHD) cao nhất.
Đó là thông tin dây “giật mình” tại Hội thảo Phòng ngừa, đấu tranh với các hành vi vi phạm pháp luật về bảo vệ động vật hoang dã, tổ chức ngày 21-12 tại Hà Nội.
Cục Cảnh sát Phòng chống Tội phạm về môi trường (C49) cho biết, các loài bị khai thác vận chuyển buôn bán bất hợp pháp chủ yếu là: rắn, kỳ đà, rùa các loại, mèo rừng, hổ, báo, hươu xạ, nai, khỉ các loại, cầy các loại, gấu, sơn dương, nhím... Nhiều nhất vẫn là rùa, rắn. Chỉ tính riêng trong năm 2010, đã có 55 vụ bị bắt giữ.
Một số người trở nên giàu có do việc lén lút thu gom, buôn bán bất hợp pháp qua các cửa khẩu. Cũng do giá ĐVHD cao nên đã kích thích nhiều người dân ồ ạt vào rừng săn bắn, bẫy các loài động vật, tổ chức từng tốp 7-8 người cùng với đàn chó săn với thời gian 3-4 ngày; cùng nhiều phương tiện săn bắt ĐVHD.
Nghiên cứu của Hội Động vật VN cũng chỉ ra, xu hướng mở rộng thị trường tiêu dùng phục vụ cho khách hàng sang trọng, không ít các viên chức, các nhà quản lý, các chủ DN chỉ muốn nếm của ngon vật lạ, đã khiến việc sử dụng ĐVHD trở thành quy mô trên toàn quốc.

description.hltext_display: Wal-Mart opens store on Arkansas campus
description.content:
Wal-Mart is going collegiate. The "Walmart on Campus" store at the University of Arkansas appears part of a series of tests of smaller-format stores for the giant retailer. The 10,000-square-foot space under development replaces a university-run pharmacy. Walmart on Campus is expected to open by next month when classes resume at the university, though it will also be open for nonstudents. In a release, the university said patients have the option of moving their prescriptions to the Walmart on Campus pharmacy or another store. Walmart plans to try a wide variety of "small-store" formats that will allow it to expand to places its supercenters -- often around 200,000 square feet in the past or even around the 180,000 square feet in the current configuration -- won't fit or can't get zoning.
Papa John's raises franchise incentives
Papa John’s has announced its 2011 Development Incentive Program, appealing to potential franchisees willing to grow with the company. Qualifying restaurants opening in the United States in 2011 in the best-of-class program can receive: no franchise fee ($25,000 value); two Middleby-Marshall ovens, which may be purchased by the franchisee for $50 after operating for two years; a royalty waiver for up to 12 months; and a $3,000 food credit with PJ Food Service, which operates Papa John's fresh dough and food distribution quality control centers, for each restaurant that opens at least 30 days prior to the scheduled opening date. These incentives are available for new unit development agreements signed by qualifying franchisees through Oct. 31, 2011. Openings must be in 2011.
First Merrell store opens in Australia
RCG Corporation has launched the first Australian flagship store for the Merrell brand. The group, which operates The Athlete's Foot chain of footwear stores in the country, became the Australian distributor for Merrell on January 1 this year. The company also opened a new store for its Shoe Superstore business in Lane Cove, Sydney.
Lightning Bolt opens flagshop in Venice
In anticipation of its 40th anniversary, Lightning Bolt officially opened the doors to its first ever flagship store in Venice, Calif. This is the first stand-alone branded shop since the original store in Honolulu during the 70s. The Lightning Bolt store is an industrial space showcasing Lightning Bolt tees, shorts, sweats and surfboards. While shopping, consumers can enjoy the nostalgia photos and posters from the early days when Lightning Bolt was first launched in Hawaii in 1971.
-- Posted December 20, 2010
Canada's foodservice sector outpacing U.S.
Restaurant chains are spreading throughout Canada faster than they are in the U.S. According to a study by Technomic, the Canadian restaurant industry has achieved a higher growth rate in 2010 than its U.S. counterpart, and that growth is expected to continue throughout 2011.
This is after the country experienced a 1.2 percent decline in unit counts in 2009. With the growth comes increased competition in all restaurant segments, as well as more product innovations making their way onto menus.
Some Canadian foodservice trends to watch include: U.S. chains have their eye on the Canadian border; the Canadian market is appealing because it is not yet saturated, and close proximity makes it easier for development and management; the fast casual segment will become more ubiquitous in 2011, with growth from both Canadian and U.S.-based chains; and Canadians are seeking new dining experiences that feature ethnic cuisines such as Korean, Southeast Asian and Mexican.
Crocs expands into Puerto Rico
Crocs, Inc. announced its expansion into Puerto Rico with new store locations. Opening this month, the Plaza Las Americas store, located in Hato Rey, and Plaza Carolina store, located in San Juan, join the Barceloneta and Old San Juan locations, which opened earlier this year to mark its first retail venture into Puerto Rico. Crocs expects to operate more than 400 company owned retail stores in shopping destinations around the globe by year-end.
-- Posted December 17, 2010
McDonald's plans major push in China
McDonald’s Corp. plans to increase investment in China by 40 percent next year and open 175 to 200 stores, according to a statement distributed before a briefing in Beijing Wednesday. China is the company’s fastest growing market in terms of new store openings, McDonald’s said. The company increased investment in the nation by 25 percent this year and will open 165 new restaurants, it said.
Whole Foods cited for LEED excellence
Whole Foods Market’s store in Lake Grove, Ill., is the first supermarket in the United States to be awarded with both a LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) Gold certification from the U.S. Green Building Council. It also received a Three Green Globe certification from the Green Building Initiative. The store, which opened in March 2010, is the third of Whole Foods Market’s 22 locations in the Northeast region to receive a LEED certification, and the first to be recognized by the Green Building Initiative.
Fresh & Easy goes solar with Arizona stores
Fresh & Easy Neighborhood Market has partnered with REC Solar, a leading solar electric system provider in the United States, to install roof-mount solar systems on nine stores in Arizona. The installation will begin in March 2011. The combined 410 kW of installed solar systems will produce an estimated 620,000 kilowatt-hours (kWh) annually, the equivalent of reducing 22 million lbs. of CO2 emissions – or removing 28 million car-driven miles – over the next 25 years. Fresh & Easy has invested in one of California’s largest solar roof installations on its distribution center in Riverside, Calif. The installation, which is more than 500,000 square feet, currently produces about one-fifth of the energy for the entire facility.
-- Posted December 16, 2010
Holiday sales rising faster than expected
U.S. retail sales will climb more than anticipated this holiday season as shoppers snap up gifts at the last minute, according to an industry index. Sales in the week ended Dec. 11 rose 0.8 percent, according to the ICSC-Goldman Sachs Weekly Chain Store Sales Index. Same- store sales at some U.S. retailers may rise as much as 4 percent in November and December, compared with an earlier projection of up to 3.5 percent, according to a statement today. Last week comparable-store sales rose 3.1 percent from a year ago, according to the index.
Dollar General set to revamp DG market
Dollar General plans to revitalize and eventually expand its DG Market format, a test concept that debuted in 2003 but was put on hold in 2007 while the chain’s new management focused on its core stores. Company officials said three of the 57 DG Markets have been remerchandised and received new layouts and design schemes, with the result that all three are experiencing strong sales growth. Next year the chain will continue to remodel and remerchandise the remaining DG Markets. Dollar General also plans to open approximately 625 new stores and remodel or relocate approximately 550 in fiscal 2011. The company will expand into three new states, Nevada, New Hampshire and Connecticut.
IHOP expanding into New York City
IHOP Corp. is expanding into the New York City area with a deal to build and develop 24 locations in the metro area, including Manhattan, Queens and a flagship locale in Times Square. The development of these traditional-style IHOP family restaurant sites is part of the company’s strategy to expand its presence to accommodate existing customers and lure new ones. In November, IHOP opened the doors of its 1,500th location, just one of approximately 60 restaurants that have debuted this year.
-- Posted December 15, 2010
Dunkin' Donuts growing in Georgia, Detroit
Dunkin’ Donuts, which is in the middle of an aggressive expansion plan that has included 338 new openings this year, has signed a store development agreement with three franchisees to develop six more restaurants in the Detroit area within the next several years. This is the fourth deal in 2010 in that market. Under the plan, three units will open in 2011, with the remaining set to open by 2014. The Detroit area currently is home to 56 Dunkin’ Donuts locations. Additionally, Dunkin’ Donuts has signed a multi-unit store development agreement to open four new restaurants in the Athens, Ga. market. The deal, with brothers David and Mark Weeks, includes one opening in 2012, and the other three by 2015.
Two restaurant chains set sights on D-FW
The Dallas-Fort Worth area is gaining two restaurant chains, thanks to Tasti D-Lite and Elevation Burgers. Tasti D-Lite plans to open 25 locations, while Elevation Burger plans for three.
-- Posted December 14, 2010
World's largest H&M store opens in Vegas
The Swedish clothing retailer will open its doors in the recently closed FAO Schwarz location at the Forum Shops at Caesars. The three-level, 55,000-square-foot store will house women’s, men’s and children’s clothing, shoes and accessories. The store was scheduled to open last month, but the opening was postponed for unknown reasons. The H&M Forum Shops location was picked to be one of a handful of U.S. stores to carry a limited edition line of clothing from luxury brand Lanvin when it was released last month, scheduled to correspond with the store’s original opening date. While the line quickly sold out in other U.S. stores, the new Forum Shops H&M will be the last location in the world to carry the line. Las Vegas already is home to two H&M locations — one at Town Square and one at the Miracle Mile Shops.
-- Posted December 13, 2010
KFC eyes potential in Africa
After spending two decades introducing fried chicken and pizza to Chinese consumers, Yum Brands Inc. now sees Africa as its next international jewel. By 2014, the Louisville, Ky., restaurant-holding company expects to double its number of KFC outlets in Africa to 1,200. In the next four years, it aims to more than double its revenue on the continent to $2 billion. The improved political stability of various African governments, the region's vast population and a growing middle class in Africa—where chicken is a dietary staple—led Yum to set its sights on the continent. The first KFC in South Africa opened in 1971 and Yum, whose brands also include Pizza Hut, Taco Bell and Long John Silver's, is now branching out into Nigeria, Namibia, Mozambique, Ghana, Zambia and other African countries.
Dunkin' Donuts growing in Milwaukee area
Dunkin’ Donuts has signed development agreements with the Milwaukee Coffee Brewing Co. (MCBC). The deal includes a plan to open 36 new restaurants in the central and southern parts of Milwaukee. MCBC currently runs more than 370 Dunkin’ Donuts restaurants in metro and upstate New York, Massachusetts, Pennsylvania, New Jersey and Connecticut. Theagreement is part of a strategic growth plan by Dunkin’ Donuts to expand through existing markets and enter new cities. It has opened about 340 locations worldwide this year, with about one-fourth of those in the United States. Additionally, 72 new domestic development commitments have been signed. Dunkin’ Donuts also seeks franchisees to develop restaurants in other parts of Wisconsin, including Green Bay and LaCrosse.
-- Posted December 10, 2010
Panera to open 1st Brooklyn location
Panera Bread is opening a new restaurant in downtown Brooklyn in the chain’s first foray into the borough. The bakery and café will occupy 2,200 square feet on the ground floor and 2,300 square feet on the second floor, which was being used for offices. The 29-year-old chain boasts 26 locations in Long Island, Queens and Staten Island but none in Manhattan. The company has more than 1,400 company-owned and franchise-operated locations in 40 states and in Ontario.
Golden Chick set to expand into China
Texas. Oklahoma. China? That's right, the Golden Chick, which maintains a philosophy of controlled, concentric, regional growth, is looking to expand into China sometime next year. Golden Chick officials secured the rights to open Golden Chick restaurants in 10 Asian countries. Today, the Dallas-based restaurant chain operates 90 units (86 franchises).
-- Posted December 9, 2010
White Castle unveils 3 fast casual styles
White Castle is testing a trio of fast-casual restaurant concepts that could help the nation’s oldest quick-service burger chain decide whether to branch off in new directions. The Columbus, Ohio–based icon, known for its little hamburgers affectionately dubbed sliders, housed the three new restaurants in rebuilt, redesigned White Castle units. The new concepts are: Deckers, a sandwich shop headlined by triple-decker grilled sandwiches, soups, and salads, located in Lebanon, Tennessee, near Nashville; Blaze Modern BBQ, a contemporary barbecue joint that offers slow-cooked meats, updated traditional sides, and imaginative sauces. It is in Lafayette, Indiana, an hour north of Indianapolis; and Laughing Noodle, featuring various noodle dishes, soups, and upscale salads, in Springfield, Ohio, a community outside Dayton.
-- Posted December 8, 2010
Retail sales jump 6% in November
Lured by steep discounts, shoppers stormed retail doors in November. But to keep the momentum going, merchants must keep the discounts coming. Sales were strong across the board at discounters, department stores and specialty apparel stores alike. All told, more than three-fourths of retailers beat expectations in November, according to Thomson Reuters, which tallied the results of 27 major chains.
The 6 percent increase over November 2009 was the biggest year-over-year gain for the crucial shopping month since 2007, as well as another sign of growing consumer confidence. And unlike the past two years, when frugal consumers shopped mainly for discounts, retailers reported that sales were strong throughout the month, with shoppers picking up more discretionary items, splurging on themselves and more willing to pay full price.
The results surprised analysts who had predicted a modest, 3.6 percent rise. They attributed the gains to earlier-than-ever holiday promotions, improving economic conditions and pent-up demand by consumers. Retail experts say a good holiday season could speed up the nation's tepid recovery because consumer spending accounts for nearly 70 percent of U.S. economic activity.
-- Posted December 7, 2010
REI to open sixth store in D.C. area
REI (Recreational Equipment, Inc.) plans to open a new store in Woodbridge, Va. at Stonebridge at Potomac Town Center in the spring of 2012. The two-story, 25,000 square-foot store will join REI’s five other locations in the Washington, D.C. area, including Bailey's Crossroads, Va., College Park, Md., Columbia, Md., Fairfax, Va. and Rockville, Md. REI operates 114 retail stores nationwide and two online stores.
Memphis retailer opens TNF shop in house
Outdoors Inc finished development on Memphis’ only North Face Summit Specialty Shop within their location on Germantown Parkway this month. The North Face Summit dealers are chosen to have the most product knowledge and widest assortment of clothing, outerwear, footwear and equipment. The Summit Shop is 400 square feet and includes all new fixtures and extensive products that cannot be found in other North Face dealers in Memphis. This is the only Summit Specialty Shop within 200 miles. Outdoors Inc has a long-standing relationship with The North Face as a premiere dealer for the last 32 years. Outdoors Inc is a local outdoor gear and clothing shop in Memphis, Tenn. that has been outfitting human-powered recreation since 1974.
-- Posted December 6, 2010
Retail space back in demand in 2011
Heading into the New Year on a high note, CBRE Econometric Advisors (CBRE-EA) is predicting retail demand for space will be positive for the first time since 2007. Following is some highlights culled from the report.
If the new analysis is on target, vacancy is expected to drop to 12.7 percent by the end of 2011; it was 13 percent at the end of Q3 2010. The uptick will be supported by the ongoing pick-up in retail sales and limited supply, according to CBRE-EA.
Researchers believe the increase will be "modest" and high availability will pressure rents until 2012 when owners should finally have enough momentum to increase rents. The forecast claims historic rent growths of more than 3 percent won't return until 2013.
CBRE-EA credited developers with forward-thinking practices that kept new space at a minimum. The construction constraint will be a long-term, positive contributor to retail real estate's recovery. Malls, neighborhood and community centers reflected 0.5 percent and 1.5 percent of supply growth during the downturn. In the next two years, supply growth is projected to be just 1 percent, well below its level between 2000 and 2008.
Starbuck reveals more growth plans
Starbucks plans to use the strength from its core business for an ambitious international growth strategy. Starbucks recently has increased its presence in Canada, Japan and emerging markets such as China, Brazil, India and Russia. The company also said it hopes to have 1,500 stores on the mainland of China by 2015. Starbucks also plans to improve its U.S. retail operations by adding mobile payment options and improving the way it serves customers during peak hours. The company is also looking at opening smaller cafes and being choosier about when and where it opens new stores.
-- Posted December 3, 2010
Nordstrom Rack to open in Tigard, Ore.
Nordstrom plans to open a new Rack discount store next fall in the Portland suburb of Tigard, Ore. The retailer said the new 45,000-square-foot store will open in Cascade Plaza in Tigard, about a mile away from a full-line Nordstrom store in the Washington Square shopping center. Cascade Plaza is a mixed-use center that includes 130,000 square-foot of retail space and 200,000 square-foot of office space. The center's retail mix also includes David's Bridal, Burlington Coat Factory, Ross and Best Buy.
Tesco to open 100 stores in Poland in 2011
Tesco has announced plans to double the number of its new stores in Poland in the next financial year which starts in March 2011. Tesco which proposes to open 50 new stores in the current financial year, plans to open 100 new stores in 2011.
A detailed store-opening plan will be revealed after the closure of budget in April 2011. The retailer currently operates 326 stores in Poland.
-- Posted December 2, 2010
Consumer confidence soars
Things are looking up, as optimism about the U.S. economy grew in November. The latest numbers on consumer sentiment are the highest level since June. The Consumer Confidence Index rose to 54.1 in November, up from a negatively revised 49.9 in October, according to the Conference Board, a New York-based research group that compiles the index. Economists were expecting the index to increase to 52. The percentage of Americans expecting business conditions to pick up over the next several months increased to 16.7 percent from 15.8 percent last month, and fewer expected circumstances to worsen. Consumers were also more positive about job prospects, with 15.5 percent expecting more jobs in the months ahead, up from 14.5 percent. And over 10 percent are anticipating a boost in their incomes.
-- Posted December 1, 2010
